[03] 234-236^b^.^eb^ ^b^vipaako natthi daanassaa^eb^tiaadi daanaadiina.m nivaara.ne kaara.nadassana.m. tattha ^b^vipaako natthi daanassaa^eb^ti daanakammassa phala.m naama natthi, kevala.m pu~n~na.m pu~n~nanti dhanavinaaso evaati diipeti. ^b^sa.myamassaa^eb^ti siilasa.myamassa. ^b^kuto phala^eb^nti kuto naama phala.m labbhati, niratthakameva siilarakkha.nanti adhippaayo. ^b^aaraamaanii^eb^ti aaraamuupavanaaniiti attho. ^b^papaayo^eb^ti paaniiyasaalaa. ^b^dugge^eb^ti udakacikkhallaana.m vasena duggama.t.thaanaani. ^b^sa"nkamanaanii^eb^ti setuyo. ^b^ tato cuto^eb^ti tato manussalokato cuto. ^b^pa~ncapa.n.naasaa^eb^ti pa~ncapa~n~naasa. ^b^yato kaala"nkato aha^eb^nti yadaa kaalakataa aha.m, tato pa.t.thaaya. ^b^naabhijaanaamii^eb^ti ettaka.m kaala.m bhutta.m vaa piita.m vaa ki~nci na jaanaami.

[03] 237-38^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo sa.myamo so vinaaso^eb^ti lobhaadivasena ya.m sa.myamana.m kassaci adaana.m, so imesa.m sattaana.m ^a^P0.0103^ea^ vinaaso naama petayoniya.m nibbattapetaana.m mahaabyasanassa hetubhaavato. ``yo vinaaso so sa.myamo''ti iminaa yathaavuttassa atthassa ekantikabhaava.m vadati. ^b^petaa hi kira jaanantii^eb^ti ettha hi-saddo avadhaara.ne, kira-saddo arucisuucane. ``sa.myamo deyyadhammassa apariccaago vinaasahetuu''ti imamattha.m petaa eva kira jaananti paccakkhato anubhuyyamaanattaa, na manussaati. nayida.m yutta.m manussaanampi petaana.m viya khuppipaasaadiihi abhibhuyyamaanaana.m dissamaanattaa. petaa pana purimattabhaave katakammassa paaka.tabhaavato tamattha.m su.t.thutara.m jaananti. tenaaha ^a^V0.0092^ea^ -- ^b^``aha.m pure sa.myamissa''^eb^ntiaadi. tattha ^b^sa.myamissa^eb^nti sayampi daanaadipu~n~nakiriyato sa.myamana.m sa"nkoca.m akaasi.m. ^b^bahuke dhane^eb^ti mahante dhane vijjamaane.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta^eb^nti ^a^M0.0098^ea^ tasmaa. ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhe. ^b^bhadda.m vo^eb^ti bhadda.m kalyaa.na.m sundara.m tumhaaka.m hotuuti vacanaseso. ^b^yaavantettha samaagataa^eb^ti yaavanto yaavatakaa ettha samaagataa, te sabbe mama vacana.m su.naathaati adhippaayo. ^b^aavii^eb^ti pakaasana.m paresa.m paaka.tavasena. ^b^raho^eb^ti pa.ticchanna.m apaaka.tavasena. ^b^aavi vaa^eb^ paa.naatipaataadimusaavaadaadikaayavaciipayogavasena, ^b^yadi vaa raho^eb^ abhijjhaadivasena ^b^paapaka.m^eb^ laamaka.m akusala^b^kamma.m maakattha^eb^ maa karittha.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ^b^sace ta.m paapaka.m kamma^eb^nti atha pana ta.m paapakamma.m aayati.m ^b^karissatha,^eb^ etarahi ^b^vaa karotha,^eb^ nirayaadiisu catuusu apaayesu manussesu ca appaayukataadivasena tassa phalabhuutaa dukkhato ^b^pamutti^eb^ pamokkho naama ^b^natthi. uppaccaapi palaayata^eb^nti uppatitvaa aakaasena gacchantaanampi mokkho natthiyevaati attho. ^b^``upeccaa''^eb^tipi paa.li, ito vaa etto vaa palaayante tumhe anubandhissatiiti adhippaayena upecca sa~ncicca palaayantaanampi ^a^P0.0104^ea^ tumhaaka.m tato mokkho natthi, gatikaalaadipaccayantarasamavaaye pana sati vipaccatiyevaati attho. aya~nca attho --
[21] ``na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbataana.m vivara.m pavissa.
[22] na vijjatii so jagatippadeso, yattha.t.thito mucceyya paapakammaa''ti.. (dha0 pa0 127; mi0 pa0 4.2.4) --

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ ^b^matteyyaa^eb^ti maatuhitaa. ^b^hothaa^eb^ti tesa.m upa.t.thaanaadiini karotha. tathaa ^b^petteyyaa^eb^ti veditabbaa. ^b^kule je.t.thaapacaayikaa^eb^ti kule je.t.thakaana.m apacaayanakaraa. ^b^saama~n~naa^eb^ti sama.napuujakaa. tathaa ^b^brahma~n~naa^eb^ti baahitapaapapuujakaati attho. ^b^eva.m sagga.m gamissathaa^eb^ti iminaa mayaa vuttanayena pu~n~naani katvaa devaloka.m upapajjissathaati attho. ya.m panettha atthato na vibhatta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa khallaa.tiyapetavatthuaadiisu vuttanayeneva veditabba.m.

[03] te ^a^M0.0099^ea^ ^a^V0.0093^ea^ vaa.nijaa tassa vacana.m sutvaa sa.mvegajaataa ta.m anukampamaanaa bhaajanehi paaniiya.m gahetvaa ta.m sayaapetvaa mukhe aasi~nci.msu. tato mahaajanena bahuvela.m aasitta.m udaka.m tassa petassa paapabalena adhoga.la.m na oti.n.na.m, kuto pipaasa.m pa.tivinessati. te ta.m pucchi.msu -- ``api te kaaci assaasamattaa laddhaa''ti. so aaha -- ``yadi me ettakehi janehi ettaka.m vela.m aasi~ncamaana.m udaka.m ekabindumattampi paraga.la.m pavi.t.tha.m, ito petayonito mokkho maa hotuu''ti. atha te vaa.nijaa ta.m sutvaa ativiya sa.mvegajaataa ``atthi pana koci upaayo pipaasaavuupasamaayaa''ti ^a^P0.0105^ea^ aaha.msu. so aaha -- ``imasmi.m paapakamme khii.ne tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakaana.m vaa daane dinne mama daanamuddisissati, aha.m ito petattato muccissaamii''ti. ta.m sutvaa vaa.nijaa saavatthi.m gantvaa bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m pavatti.m aarocetvaa sara.naani siilaani ca gahetvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa sattaaha.m daana.m datvaa tassa petassa dakkhi.na.m aadisi.msu. bhagavaa tamattha.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa catunna.m parisaana.m dhamma.m desesi. mahaajano ca lobhaadimaccheramala.m pahaaya daanaadipu~n~naabhirato ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^naggo kiso pabbajitosi, bhante^eb^ti ida.m satthari ve.luvane viharante cuu.lase.t.thipeta.m aarabbha vutta.m. baaraa.nasiya.m kira eko gahapati assaddho appasanno maccharii kadariyo pu~n~nakiriyaaya anaadaro cuu.lase.t.thi naama ahosi. so kaala.m katvaa petesu nibbatti, tassa kaayo apagatama.msalohito a.t.thinhaarucammamatto mu.n.do apetavattho ahosi. dhiitaa panassa anulaa andhakavinde saamikassa gehe vasantii pitara.m uddissa braahma.ne bhojetukaamaa ta.n.dulaadiini daanuupakara.naani sajjesi. ta.m ~natvaa peto aasaaya aakaasena tattha gacchanto raajagaha.m sampaapu.ni. tena ca samayena raajaa ajaatasattu devadattena ^a^M0.0100^ea^ uyyojito pitara.m jiivitaa voropetvaa tena vippa.tisaarena dussupinena ca nidda.m anupagacchanto uparipaasaadavaragato ca"nkamanto ta.m peta.m aakaasena gacchanta.m disvaa imaaya gaathaaya pucchi --
[21] ``naggo ^a^P0.0106^ea^ kiso pabbajitosi bhante, ratti.m kuhi.m gacchasi kissahetu.
[22] aacikkha me ta.m api sakku.nemu, sabbena vitta.m pa.tipaadaye tuva''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0094^ea^ ^b^pabbajito^eb^ti sama.no. raajaa kira ta.m naggattaa mu.n.dattaa ca ``naggo sama.no aya''nti sa~n~naaya ``naggo kiso pabbajitosii''tiaadimaaha. ^b^kissahetuu^eb^ti kinnimitta.m. ^b^sabbena vitta.m pa.tipaadaye tuva^eb^nti vittiyaa upakara.nabhuuta.m vitta.m sabbena bhogena tuyha.m ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m, sabbena vaa ussaahena pa.tipaadeyya.m sampaadeyya.m. tathaa kaatu.m maya.m appeva naama sakku.neyyaama, tasmaa ^b^aacikkha me ta.m,^eb^ eta.m tava aagamanakaara.na.m mayha.m kathehiiti attho.
[03] eva.m ra~n~naa pu.t.tho peto attano pavatti.m kathento tisso gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``baaraa.nasii nagara.m duuraghu.t.tha.m, tatthaaha.m gahapati a.d.dhako ahu diino.
[22] adaataa gedhitamano aamisasmi.m, dussiilyena yamavisayamhi patto..
[21] ``dhiitaa ca mayha.m lapate abhikkha.na.m, dassaami daana.m pituuna.m pitaamahaana.m.
[22] tamupakkha.ta.m ^a^P0.0107^ea^ parivisayanti braahma.naa, yaami aha.m andhakavinda.m bhuttu''nti..

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0101^ea^ ^b^duuraghu.t.tha^eb^nti duurato eva gu.nakittanavasena ghosita.m, sabbattha vissuta.m paaka.tanti attho. ^b^a.d.dhako^eb^ti a.d.dho mahaavibhavo. ^b^diino^eb^ti nihiinacitto adaanajjhaasayo. tenaaha ^b^``adaataa''^eb^ti. ^b^gedhitamano aamisasmi^eb^nti kaamaamise laggacitto gedha.m aapanno. ^b^dussiilyena yamavisayamhi patto^eb^ti attanaa katena dussiilakammunaa yamavisaya.m petaloka.m patto amhi.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ^b^so suucikaaya kilamito^eb^ti so aha.m vijjhana.t.thena suucisadisataaya ``suucikaa''ti laddhanaamaaya jighacchaaya kilamito nirantara.m vijjhamaano. ``kilamatho''ti icceva vaa paa.tho. ^b^tehii^eb^ti ``diino''tiaadinaa vuttehi paapakammehi kaara.nabhuutehi. tassa hi petassa ^a^V0.0095^ea^ taani paapakammaani anussarantassa ativiya domanassa.m uppajji, tasmaa evamaaha. ^b^tenevaa^eb^ti teneva jighacchaadukkhena. ^b^~naatiisu yaamii^eb^ti ~naatiina.m samiipa.m yaami gacchaami. ^b^aamisaki~ncikkhahetuu^eb^ti aamisassa ki~ncikkhanimitta.m, ki~nci aamisa.m patthentoti attho. ^b^adaanasiilaa na ca saddahanti, `daanaphala.m hoti paramhi loke'^eb^ti yathaa aha.m, tathaa eva.m a~n~nepi manussaa adaanasiilaa ``daanassa phala.m eka.msena paraloke hotii''ti na ca saddahanti. yato aha.m viya tepi petaa hutvaa mahaadukkha.m paccanubhavantiiti adhippaayo.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ^b^lapate^eb^ti katheti. ^b^abhikkha.na^eb^nti abhi.nha.m bahuso. kinti lapatiiti aaha ^b^``dassaami daana.m pituuna.m pitaamahaana''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^pituuna^eb^nti maataapituuna.m, cuu.lapitumahaapituuna.m vaa. ^b^pitaamahaana^eb^nti ayyakapayyakaana.m. ^b^upakkha.ta^eb^nti sajjita.m. ^b^parivisayantii^eb^ti bhojayanti. ^b^andhakavinda^eb^nti eva.mnaamaka.m nagara.m. ^b^bhuttu^eb^nti bhu~njitu.m. tato ^a^P0.0108^ea^ paraa sa"ngiitikaarakehi vuttaa --
[26] aacikkha me ta.m yadi atthi hetu,
[21] ``tathaati ^a^M0.0102^ea^ vatvaa agamaasi tattha, bhu~nji.msu bhatta.m na ca dakkhi.naarahaa.
[22] paccaagami raajagaha.m punaapara.m, paaturahosi purato janaadhipassa..
[21] ``disvaana peta.m punadeva aagata.m, raajaa avoca `ahamapi ki.m dadaami.
[22] aacikkha me ta.m yadi atthi hetu, yena tuva.m ciratara.m pii.nito siyaa'..
[21] ``buddha~nca sa"ngha.m parivisiyaana raaja, annena paanena ca ciivarena.
[22] ta.m dakkhi.na.m aadisa me hitaaya, eva.m aha.m ciratara.m pii.nito siyaa..
[21] ``tato ca raajaa nipatitvaa taavade, daana.m sahatthaa atula.m daditvaa sa"nghe.
[22] aarocesi pakata.m tathaagatassa, tassa ca petassa dakkhi.na.m aadisittha..
[21] ``so ^a^V0.0096^ea^ puujito ativiya sobhamaano, paaturahosi purato janaadhipassa.
[22] yakkhohamasmi paramiddhipatto, na mayhamatthi samaa sadisaa maanusaa..
[21] ``passaanubhaava.m aparimita.m mamayida.m, tayaanudi.t.tha.m atula.m datvaa sa"nghe.
[22] santappito ^a^P0.0109^ea^ satata.m sadaa bahuuhi, yaami aha.m sukhito manussadevaa''ti..

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tamavoca raajaa^eb^ti ta.m peta.m tathaa vatvaa .thita.m raajaa ajaatasattu avoca. ^b^anubhaviyaana tampii^eb^ti ta.m tava dhiituyaa upakkha.ta.m daanampi anubhavitvaa. ^b^eyyaasii^eb^ti aagaccheyyaasi. ^b^kassa^eb^nti karissaami. ^b^aacikkha^eb^ ^a^M0.0103^ea^ ^b^me ta.m yadi atthi hetuu^eb^ti sace ki~nci kaara.na.m atthi, ta.m kaara.na.m mayha.m aacikkha kathehi. ^b^saddhaayita^eb^nti saddhaayitabba.m. ^b^hetuvaco^eb^ti hetuyuttavacana.m, ``amukasmi.m .thaane asukena pakaarena daane kate mayha.m upakappatii''ti sakaara.na.m vacana.m vadaati attho.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathaati vatvaa^eb^ti saadhuuti vatvaa. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m andhakavinde parivesana.t.thaane. ^b^bhu~nji.msu bhatta.m na ca dakkhi.naarahaa^eb^ti bhatta.m bhu~nji.msu dussiilabraahma.naa, na ca pana dakkhi.naarahaa siilavanto bhu~nji.msuuti attho. ^b^punaapara^eb^nti puna apara.m vaara.m raajagaha.m paccaagami.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ ^b^ki.m dadaamii^eb^ti ``kiidisa.m te daana.m dassaamii''ti raajaa peta.m pucchi. ^b^yena tuva^eb^nti yena kaara.nena tva.m. ^b^ciratara^eb^nti cirakaala.m. ^b^pii.nito^eb^ti titto siyaa, ta.m kathehiiti attho.
[03] 253^b^.^eb^ ^b^parivisiyaanaa^eb^ti bhojetvaa. ^b^raajaa^eb^ti ajaatasattu.m aalapati. ^b^me hitaayaa^eb^ti mayha.m hitatthaaya petattabhaavato parimuttiyaa.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmaa tena vacanena, tato vaa paasaadato. ^b^nipatitvaa^eb^ti nikkhamitvaa. ^b^taavade^eb^ti tadaa eva aru.nuggamanavelaaya. yamhi peto paccaagantvaa ra~n~no attaana.m dassesi, tasmi.m purebhatte eva daana.m adaasi ^a^P0.0110^ea^. ^b^sahatthaa^eb^ti sahatthena. ^b^atula^eb^nti appamaa.na.m u.laara.m pa.niita.m. ^b^datvaa sa"nghe^eb^ti sa"nghassa datvaa. ^b^aarocesi pakata.m tathaagatassaa^eb^ti ``ida.m, bhante, daana.m a~n~natara.m peta.m sandhaaya pakata''nti ta.m pavatti.m bhagavato aarocesi. aarocetvaa ^a^V0.0097^ea^ ca yathaa ta.m daana.m tassa upakappati, eva.m tassa ca petassa dakkhi.na.m aadisittha aadisi.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti so peto. ^b^puujito^eb^ti dakkhi.naaya diyyamaanaaya puujito. ^b^ativiya sobhamaano^eb^ti dibbaanubhaavena ativiya virocamaano. ^b^paaturahosii^eb^ti paatubhavi, ra~n~no purato attaana.m dassesi. ^b^yakkhohamasmii^eb^ti petattabhaavato mutto yakkho aha.m jaato devabhaava.m pattosmi. ^b^na mayhamatthi samaa sadisaa maanusaa^eb^ti mayha.m aanubhaavasampattiyaa samaa vaa bhogasampattiyaa sadisaa vaa manussaa na santi.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ ^b^passaanubhaava.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0104^ea^ ^b^aparimita.m mamayida^eb^nti ``mama ida.m aparimaa.na.m dibbaanubhaava.m passaa''ti attano sampatti.m paccakkhato ra~n~no dassento vadati. ^b^tayaanudi.t.tha.m atula.m datvaa sa"nghe^eb^ti ariyasa"nghassa atula.m u.laara.m daana.m datvaa mayha.m anukampaaya tayaa anudi.t.tha.m. ^b^santappito satata.m sadaa bahuuhii^eb^ti annapaanavatthaadiihi bahuuhi deyyadhammehi ariyasa"ngha.m santappentena tayaa sadaa sabbakaala.m yaavajiiva.m tatthaapi satata.m nirantara.m aha.m santappito pii.nito. ^b^yaami aha.m sukhito manussadevaa^eb^ti ``tasmaa aha.m idaani sukhito manussadeva mahaaraaja yathicchita.t.thaana.m yaamii''ti raajaana.m aapucchi.

[03] eva.m ^a^P0.0111^ea^ pete aapucchitvaa gate raajaa ajaatasattu tamattha.m bhikkhuuna.m aarocesi, bhikkhuu bhagavato santika.m upasa"nkamitvaa aarocesu.m. bhagavaa tamattha.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattaparisaaya dhamma.m desesi. ta.m sutvaa mahaajano maccheramala.m pahaaya daanaadipu~n~naabhirato ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^yassa atthaaya gacchaamaa^eb^ti ida.m satthaa saavatthiya.m viharanto a"nkurapeta.m aarabbha kathesi. kaama~ncettha a"nkuro peto na hoti, tassa pana carita.m yasmaa petasambandha.m, tasmaa ta.m ``a"nkurapetavatthuu''ti vutta.m.

[03] tatraaya.m sa"nkhepakathaa -- ye te uttaramadhuraadhipatino ra~n~no mahaasaagarassa putta.m upasaagara.m pa.ticca ^a^V0.0098^ea^ uttaraapathe ka.msabhoge asita~njananagare mahaaka.msassa dhiituyaa devagabbhaaya kucchiya.m uppannaa a~njanadevii vaasudevo baladevo candadevo suuriyadevo aggidevo varu.nadevo ajjuno pajjuno gha.tapa.n.dito a"nkuro caati vaasudevaadayo dasa bhaatikaati ekaadasa khattiyaa ahesu.m, tesu vaasudevaadayo bhaataro asita~njananagara.m aadi.m katvaa dvaaravatiipariyosaanesu sakalajambudiipe tesa.t.thiyaa nagarasahassesu sabbe raajaano cakkena ^a^M0.0105^ea^ jiivitakkhaya.m paapetvaa dvaaravatiya.m vasamaanaa rajja.m dasa ko.t.thaase katvaa vibhaji.msu. bhagini.m pana a~njanadevi.m na sari.msu. puna saritvaa ``ekaadasa ko.t.thaase karomaa''ti vutte tesa.m sabbakani.t.tho a"nkuro ``mama ko.t.thaasa.m tassaa detha, aha.m vohaara.m katvaa jiivissaami, tumhe attano attano janapadesu su"nka.m mayha.m vissajjethaa''ti aaha. te ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa tassa ko.t.thaaya.m bhaginiyaa datvaa nava raajaano dvaaravatiya.m vasi.msu.

[03] a"nkuro pana va.nijja.m karonto niccakaala.m mahaadaana.m deti. tassa paneko daaso ^a^P0.0112^ea^ bha.n.daagaariko atthakaamo ahosi. a"nkuro pasannamaanaso tassa eka.m kuladhiitara.m gahetvaa adaasi. so putte gabbhagateyeva kaalamakaasi. a"nkuro tasmi.m jaate tassa pituno dinna.m bhattavetana.m tassa adaasi. atha tasmi.m daarake vayappatte ``daaso na daaso''ti raajakule vinicchayo uppajji. ta.m sutvaa a~njanadevii dhenuupama.m vatvaa ``maatu bhujissaaya puttopi bhujisso evaa''ti daasabyato mocesi.

[03] daarako pana lajjaaya tattha vasitu.m avisahanto roruvanagara.m gantvaa tattha a~n~natarassa tunnavaayassa dhiitara.m gahetvaa tunnavaayasippena jiivika.m kappesi. tena samayena roruvanagare asayhamahaase.t.thi naama ahosi. so sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikavanibbakayaacakaana.m mahaadaana.m deti. so tunnavaayo se.t.thino ghara.m ajaanantaana.m piitisomanassajaato hutvaa asayhase.t.thino nivesana.m dakkhi.nabaahu.m pasaaretvaa dassesi ``ettha gantvaa laddhabba.m labhantuu''ti. tassa kamma.m paa.liya.myeva aagata.m.

[03] so aparena samayena kaala.m katvaa marubhuumiya.m a~n~natarasmi.m nigrodharukkhe bhummadevataa hutvaa nibbatti, tassa dakkhi.nahattho sabbakaamadado ahosi. tasmi.myeva ca roruve a~n~nataro puriso asayhase.t.thino daane byaava.to assaddho appasanno micchaadi.t.thiko pu~n~nakiriyaaya anaadaro kaala.m katvaa tassa devaputtassa vasana.t.thaanassa aviduure peto hutvaa nibbatti. tena ca ^a^V0.0099^ea^ katakamma.m paa.liya.myeva aagata.m. asayhamahaase.t.thi pana kaala.m katvaa taavati.msabhavane sakkassa devara~n~no sahabyata.m upagato.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0106^ea^ aparena samayena a"nkuro pa~ncahi saka.tasatehi, a~n~nataro ca braahma.no pa~ncahi saka.tasatehiiti dvepi janaa saka.tasahassena bha.n.da.m aadaaya marukantaaramagga.m pa.tipannaa maggamuu.lhaa hutvaa bahu.m divasa.m tattheva vicarantaa parikkhii.nati.nodakaahaaraa ahesu.m. a"nkuro assaduutehi catuusu disaasu paaniya.m maggaapesi. atha so kaamadadahattho yakkho ta.m tesa.m byasanappatti.m disvaa a"nkurena pubbe ^a^P0.0113^ea^ attano kata.m upakaara.m cintetvaa ``handa daani imassa mayaa avassayena bhavitabba''nti attano vasanava.tarukkha.m dassesi. so kira va.tarukkho saakhaavi.tapasampanno ghanapalaaso sandacchaayo anekasahassapaaroho aayaamena vitthaarena ubbedhena ca yojanaparimaa.no ahosi. ta.m disvaa a"nkuro ha.t.thatu.t.tho tassa he.t.thaa khandhaavaara.m bandhaapesi. yakkho attano dakkhi.nahattha.m pasaaretvaa pa.thama.m taava paaniiyena sabba.m jana.m santappesi. tato yo yo ya.m ya.m icchati, tassa tassa ta.m ta.m adaasi.

[03] eva.m tasmi.m mahaajane naanaavidhena annapaanaadinaa yathaakaama.m santappite pacchaa vuupasante maggaparissame so braahma.navaa.nijo ayoniso manasikaronto eva.m cintesi -- ``dhanalaabhaaya ito kamboja.m gantvaa maya.m ki.m karissaama, imameva pana yakkha.m yena kenaci upaayena gahetvaa yaana.m aaropetvaa amhaaka.m nagarameva gamissaamaa''ti. eva.m cintetvaa tamattha.m a"nkurassa kathento --
[22] aya.m kaamadado yakkho, ima.m yakkha.m nayaamase..

[25] gaathaadvayamaaha. tattha ^b^yassa atthaayaa^eb^ti yassa kaara.naa. ^b^kamboja^eb^nti kambojara.t.tha.m. ^b^dhanahaarakaa^eb^ti bha.n.davikkayena laddhadhanahaarino. ^b^kaamadado^eb^ti icchiticchitadaayako. ^b^yakkho^eb^ti devaputto. ^b^nayaamase^eb^ti nayissaama ^a^M0.0107^ea^. ^b^saadhukenaa^eb^ti yaacanena. ^b^pasayhaa^eb^ti abhibhavitvaa balakkaarena, ^b^yaana^eb^nti sukhayaana.m ^a^V0.0100^ea^. ^b^dvaaraka^eb^nti dvaaravatiinagara.m. aya.m hetthaadhippaayo -- yadattha.m maya.m ito kamboja.m gantukaamaa, tena gamanena saadhetabbo attho idheva sijjhati. aya~nhi yakkho kaamadado, tasmaa ^a^P0.0114^ea^ ima.m yakkha.m yaacitvaa tassa anumatiyaa vaa, sace sa~n~natti.m na gacchati, balakkaarena vaa yaana.m aaropetvaa yaane pacchaabaaha.m bandhitvaa ta.m gahetvaa itoyeva khippa.m dvaaravatiinagara.m gacchaamaati.
[03] eva.m pana braahma.nena vutto a"nkuro sappurisadhamme .thatvaa tassa vacana.m pa.tikkhipanto --
[22] na tassa saakha.m bha~njeyya, mittadubbho hi paapako''ti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^na bha~njeyyaa^eb^ti na chindeyya. ^b^mittadubbho^eb^ti mittesu dubbhana.m tesa.m anatthuppaadana.m. ^b^paapako^eb^ti abhaddako mittadubbho. yo hi siitacchaayo rukkho ghammaabhitattassa purisassa parissamavinodako, tassaapi naama paapaka.m na cintetabba.m, kima"nka.m pana sattabhuutesu. aya.m devaputto sappuriso pubbakaarii amhaaka.m dukkhapanuudako bahuupakaaro, na tassa ki~nci anattha.m cintetabba.m, a~n~nadatthu so puujetabbo evaati dasseti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa braahma.naa ``atthassa muula.m nikativinayo''ti niitimagga.m nissaaya a"nkurassa pa.tilomapakkhe .thatvaa --
[22] khandhampi tassa chindeyya, attho ce taadiso siyaa''ti.. --
[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^attho ce taadiso siyaa^eb^ti taadisena dabbasambhaarena sace attho bhaveyya, tassa rukkhassa khandhampi chindeyya, kima"nga.m pana saakhaadayoti adhippaayo.
[03] eva.m ^a^M0.0108^ea^ braahma.nena vutte a"nkuro sappurisadhamma.myeva pagga.nhanto --
[22] na tassa patta.m bhindeyya, mittadubbho hi paapako''ti.. --
[25] ima.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^a^P0.0115^ea^ ^b^na tassa patta.m bhindeyyaa^eb^ti tassa rukkhassa ekapa.n.namattampi na paateyya, pageva saakhaadiketi adhippaayo.
[22] samuulampi ta.m abbuhe, attho ce taadiso siyaa''ti.. --
[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^samuulampi ta.m abbuhe^eb^ti ta.m tattha samuulampi saha muulenapi abbuheyya, uddhareyyaati attho.
[03] eva.m braahma.nena vutte puna a"nkuro ta.m niiti.m niratthaka.m kaatukaamo --
[22] na tassa paapa.m manasaapi cintaye, kata~n~nutaa sappurisehi va.n.nitaa..
[21] ``yassekarattimpi ghare vaseyya, annena paanena upa.t.thito siyaa.
[22] na tassa paapa.m manasaapi cintaye, adubbhapaa.nii dahate mittadubbhi.m..
[22] allapaa.nihato poso, na so bhadraani passatii''ti.. --

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yassaa^eb^ti yassa puggalassa. ^b^ekarattimpii^eb^ti ekarattimattampi kevala.m gehe vaseyya. ^b^yatthannapaana.m puriso labhethaa^eb^ti yassa santike koci puriso annapaana.m vaa ya.mki~nci bhojana.m ^a^V0.0102^ea^ vaa labheyya. ^b^na tassa^eb^ ^a^P0.0116^ea^ ^b^paapa.m manasaapi cintaye^eb^ti tassa puggalassa abhaddaka.m anattha.m ^a^M0.0109^ea^ manasaapi na cinteyya na piheyya, pageva kaayavaacaahi. kasmaati ce? ^b^kata~n~nutaa sappurisehi va.n.nitaa^eb^ti kata~n~nutaa naama buddhaadiihi uttamapurisehi pasa.msitaa.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ ^b^upa.t.thito^eb^ti payirupaasito ``ida.m ga.nha ida.m bhu~njaa''ti annapaanaadinaa upa.t.thito. ^b^adubbhapaa.nii^eb^ti ahi.msakahattho hatthasa.myato. ^b^dahate mittadubbhi^eb^nti ta.m mittadubbhi.m puggala.m dahati vinaaseti, appadu.t.the hitajjhaasayasampanne puggale parena kato aparaadho avisesena tasseva anatthaavaho, appadu.t.tho puggalo atthato ta.m dahati naama. tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``yo appadu.t.thassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa ana"nga.nassa.
[22] tameva baala.m pacceti paapa.m, sukhumo rajo pa.tivaata.mva khitto''ti.. (dha0 pa0 125; jaa0 1.5.94; sa.m0 ni0 1.22).

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo pubbe katakalyaa.no^eb^ti yo puggalo kenaci saadhunaa katabhaddako katuupakaaro. ^b^pacchaa paapena hi.msatii^eb^ti ta.m pubbakaarina.m aparabhaage paapena abhaddakena anatthakena baadhati. ^b^allapaa.nihato poso^eb^ti allapaa.ninaa upakaarakiriyaaya allapaa.ninaa dhotahatthena pubbakaarinaa he.t.thaa vuttanayena hato baadhito, tassa vaa pubbakaarino baadhanena hato allapaa.nihato naama, akata~n~nupuggalo. ^b^na so bhadraani passatii^eb^ti so yathaavuttapuggalo idhaloke ca paraloke ca i.t.thaani na passati, na vindati, na labhatiiti attho.

[03] eva.m ^a^P0.0117^ea^ sappurisadhamma.m pagga.nhantena a"nkurena abhibhavitvaa vutto so braahma.no niruttaro tu.nhii ahosi. yakkho pana tesa.m dvinna.m vacanapa.tivacanaani sutvaa braahma.nassa kujjhitvaapi ``hotu imassa du.t.thabraahma.nassa kattabba.m pacchaa jaanissaamii''ti attano kenaci anabhibhavaniiyatameva taava dassento --
[21] ``naaha.m ^a^M0.0110^ea^ devena vaa manussena vaa, issariyena vaa ha.m suppasayho.

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^devena vaa^eb^ti yena kenaci devena vaa. ^b^manussena vaa^eb^ti etthaapi eseva nayo. ^b^issariyena^eb^ ^a^V0.0103^ea^ ^b^vaa^eb^ti devissariyena vaa manussissariyena vaa. tattha devissariya.m naama catumahaaraajikasakkasuyaamaadiina.m deviddhi, manussissariya.m naama cakkavattiaadiina.m pu~n~niddhi. tasmaa issariyaggaha.nena mahaanubhaave devamanusse sa"nga.nhaati. mahaanubhaavaapi hi devaa attano pu~n~naphaluupatthambhite manussepi asati payogavipattiya.m abhibhavitu.m na sakkonti, pageva itare. ^b^ha^eb^nti asahane nipaato. ^b^na suppasayho^eb^ti appadha.msiyo. ^b^yakkhohamasmi paramiddhipatto^eb^ti attano pu~n~naphalena aha.m yakkhatta.m upagato asmi, yakkhova samaano na yo vaa so vaa, atha kho paramiddhipatto paramaaya uttamaaya yakkhiddhiyaa samannaagato. ^b^duura"ngamo^eb^ti kha.neneva duurampi .thaana.m gantu.m samattho. ^b^va.n.nabaluupapanno^eb^ti ruupasampattiyaa sariirabalena ca upapanno samannaagatoti tiihipi padehi mantappayogaadiihi attano anabhibhavaniiyata.myeva dasseti. ruupasampanno hi paresa.m bahumaanito hoti, ruupasampada.m nissaaya ^a^P0.0118^ea^ visabhaagavatthunaapi anaaka.d.dhaniyovaati va.n.nasampadaa anabhibhavaniiyakaara.nanti vuttaa.
[03] ito para.m a"nkurassa ca devaputtassa ca vacanapa.tivacanakathaa hoti --
[21] ``naamhi devo na gandhabbo, naapi sakko purindado.
[22] peta.m ma.m a"nkura jaanaahi, roruvamhaa idhaagata.m..
[22] kena te brahmacariyena, pu~n~na.m paa.nimhi ijjhati..
[22] sukicchavutti kapa.no, na me vijjati daatave..
[22] te ca ma.m tattha pucchanti, asayhassa nivesana.m..
[21] ``kattha gacchaama bhadda.m vo, kattha daana.m padiiyati.
[21] ``paggayha dakkhi.na.m baahu.m, ettha gacchatha bhadda.m vo.
[22] tena me brahmacariyena, pu~n~na.m paa.nimhi ijjhati..
[21] ``na kira tva.m adaa daana.m, sakapaa.niihi kassaci.
[22] parassa daana.m anumodamaano, paa.ni.m paggayha paavadi..
[22] tena te brahmacariyena, pu~n~na.m paa.nimhi ijjhati..
[22] so hitvaa maanusa.m deha.m, ki.m nu so disata.m gato..
[21] ``naaha.m pajaanaami asayhasaahino, a"ngiirasassa gati.m aagati.m vaa.
[22] suta~nca ^a^P0.0119^ea^ me vessava.nassa santike, sakkassa sahabyata.m gato asayho..
[22] paa.ni.m kaamadada.m disvaa, ko pu~n~na.m na karissati..
[21] ``so ^a^M0.0112^ea^ hi nuuna ito gantvaa, anuppatvaana dvaaraka.m.

[03] 267^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^paa.ni te^eb^ti tava dakkhi.nahattho. ^b^sabbasova.n.no^eb^ti sabbaso suva.n.nava.n.no. ^b^pa~ncadhaaro^eb^ti pa~ncahi a"nguliihi parehi kaamitavatthuuna.m dhaaraa etassa santiiti pa~ncadhaaro. ^b^madhussavo^eb^ti madhurarasavissandako. tenaaha ^b^``naanaarasaa paggharantii''^eb^ti, madhuraka.tukakasaavaadibhedaa naanaavidhaa rasaa vissandantiiti attho. yakkhassa hi kaamadade madhuraadirasasampannaani vividhaani khaadaniiyabhojaniiyaani hatthe vissajjante madhuraadirasaa paggharantiiti vutta.m. ^b^ma~n~neha.m ta.m purindada^eb^nti ma~n~ne aha.m ta.m purindada.m sakka.m, ``eva.mmahaanubhaavo sakko devaraajaa''ti ta.m aha.m ma~n~naamiiti attho.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ ^b^naamhi devo^eb^ti vessava.naadiko paaka.tadevo na homi. ^b^na gandhabbo^eb^ti gandhabbakaayikadevopi na homi. ^b^naapi sakko purindado^eb^ti purimattabhaave pure daanassa pa.t.thapitattaa ``purindado''ti laddhanaamo sakko devaraajaapi na homi. kataro pana ahosiiti aaha ^b^``peta.m ma.m a"nkura jaanaahii''^eb^tiaadi. a"nkurapetuupapattika.m ma.m jaanaahi, ``a~n~nataro petamahiddhiko''ti ma.m upadhaarehi. ^b^roruvamhaa idhaagata^eb^nti roruvanagarato cavitvaa marukantaare idha imasmi.m nigrodharukkhe upapajjanavasena aagata.m, ettha nibbattanti attho.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ ^b^ki.msiilo ki.msamaacaaro, roruvasmi.m pure tuva^eb^nti pubbe purimattabhaave roruvanagare vasanto tva.m ki.msiilo ^a^P0.0120^ea^ ki.msamaacaaro ahosi, paapato nivattanalakkha.na.m kiidisa.m siila.m samaadaaya sa.mvattitapu~n~nakiriyaalakkha.nena samaacaarena ki.msamaacaaro, daanaadiisu kusalasamaacaaresu kiidiso samaacaaro ahosiiti attho. ^b^kena te brahmacariyena^eb^ ^a^M0.0113^ea^, ^b^pu~n~na.m paa.nimhi ijjhatii^eb^ti kiidisena se.t.thacariyena ida.m evaruupa.m tava hatthesu pu~n~naphala.m idaani samijjhati nipphajjati, ta.m kathehiiti attho. pu~n~naphala~nhi idha uttarapadalopena ``pu~n~na''nti adhippeta.m. tatthaa hi ta.m ``kusalaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m samaadaanahetu evamida.m pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatii''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 3.80) pu~n~nanti vutta.m.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ ^b^tunnavaayo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0106^ea^ tunnakaaro. ^b^sukicchavuttii^eb^ti su.t.thu kicchaputtiko ativiya dukkhajiiviko. ^b^kapa.no^eb^ti varaako, diinoti attho. ^b^na me vijjati daatave^eb^ti addhikaana.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m daatu.m ki~nci daatabbayuttaka.m mayha.m natthi, citta.m pana me daana.m dinnanti adhippaayo.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ ^b^nivesana^eb^nti ghara.m, kammakara.nasaalaa vaa. ^b^asayhassa upantike^eb^ti asayhassa mahaase.t.thino gehassa samiipe. ^b^saddhassaa^eb^ti kammaphalasaddhaaya samannaagatassa. ^b^daanapatino^eb^ti daane nirantarappavattaaya pariccaagasampattiyaa lobhassa ca abhibhavena patibhuutassa. ^b^katapu~n~nassaa^eb^ti pubbe katasucaritakammassa. ^b^lajjino^eb^ti paapajigucchanasabhaavassa.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m mama nivesane. ^b^yaacanakaayantii^eb^ti yaacanakaa janaa asayhase.t.thi.m ki~nci yaacitukaamaa aagacchanti. ^b^naanaagottaa^eb^ti naanaavidhagottaapadesaa. ^b^vanibbakaa^eb^ti va.n.nadiipakaa, ye daayakassa pu~n~naphalaadi~nca gu.nakittanaadimukhena attano atthikabhaava.m pavedentaa vicaranti. ^b^te ca ma.m tattha pucchantii^eb^ti ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m, te yaacakaadayo ma.m asayhase.t.thino nivesana.m pucchanti. akkharacintakaa hi iidisesu .thaanesu kammadvaya.m ^a^P0.0121^ea^ icchanti.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ^b^kattha gacchaama bhadda.m vo, kattha daana.m padiiyatii^eb^ti tesa.m pucchanaakaaradassana.m. aya.m pettha attho -- bhadda.m tumhaaka.m hotu, maya.m ``asayhamahaase.t.thinaa daana.m padiiyatii''ti sutvaa aagataa, kattha daana.m padiiyati, kattha vaa maya.m gacchaama, kattha gatena daana.m sakkaa laddhunti. ^b^tesaaha.m pu.t.tho akkhaamii^eb^ti eva.m tehi addhikajanehi labhana.t.thaana.m pu.t.tho ^a^M0.0114^ea^ ``aha.m pubbe akatapu~n~nataaya idaani iidisaana.m ki~nci daatu.m asamattho jaato, daanagga.m pana imesa.m dassento laabhassa upaayaacikkha.nena piiti.m uppaadento ettakenapi bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavaamii''ti gaarava.m uppaadetvaa dakkhi.na.m baahu.m pasaaretvaa tesa.m asayhase.t.thissa nivesana.m akkhaami. tenaaha ^b^``paggayha dakkhi.na.m baahu''^eb^ntiaadi.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena paa.ni kaamadado^eb^ti tena paradaanapakaasanena parena katassa daanassa sakkacca.m anumodanamattena hetunaa idaani mayha.m hattho kapparukkho viya santaanakalataa viya ca kaamaduho icchiticchitadaayii kaamadado hoti. kaamadado ca honto ^b^tena paa.ni madhussavo^eb^ i.t.thavatthuvissajjanako jaato.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ^bna ^a^V0.0107^ea^ kira tva.m adaa daanab^nti ^b^kiraa^eb^ti anussavanatthe nipaato, tva.m kira attano santaka.m na pariccaji, ^b^sakapaa.niihi^eb^ sahatthehi yassa kassaci sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa ki~nci daana.m na adaasi. ^b^parassa daana.m anumodamaano^eb^ti kevala.m pana parena kata.m parassa daana.m ``aho daana.m pavattesii''ti anumodamaanoyeva vihaasi.
[03] 277^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena paa.ni kaamadado^eb^ti tena tuyha.m paa.ni eva.m kaamadado, aho acchariyaa vata pu~n~naana.m gatiiti adhippaayo.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo so daanamadaa, bhante, pasanno sakapaa.nibhii^eb^ti devaputta.m gaaravena aalapati. bhante, parena ^a^P0.0122^ea^ katassa daanaanumodakassa taava tuyha.m iidisa.m phala.m evaruupo aanubhaavo, yo pana so asayhamahaase.t.thi mahaadaana.m adaasi, pasannacitto hutvaa sahatthehi tadaa mahaadaana.m pavattesi. ^b^so hitvaa maanusa.m deha^eb^nti so idha manussattabhaava.m pahaaya. ^b^ki^eb^nti katara.m. ^b^nu so^eb^ti ^b^nuu^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^disata.m gato^eb^ti disa.m .thaana.m gato, kiidisii tassa gato nipphattiiti asayhase.t.thino abhisamparaaya.m pucchi.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ ^b^asayhasaahino^eb^ti a~n~nehi macchariihi lobhaabhibhuutehi sahitu.m vahitu.m asakku.neyyassa pariccaagaadivibhaagassa sappurisadhurassa sahanato ^a^M0.0115^ea^ asayhasaahino. ^b^a"ngiirasassaa^eb^ti a"ngato nikkhamanakajutissa. rasoti hi jutiyaa adhivacana.m. tassa kira yaacake aagacchante disvaa u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m uppajjati, mukhava.n.no vippasiidati, ta.m attano paccakkha.m katvaa evamaaha. ^b^gati.m aagati.m vaa^eb^ti tassa ``asuka.m naama gati.m, ito gato''ti gati.m vaa ``tato vaa pana asukasmi.m kaale idhaagamissatii''ti aagati.m vaa naaha.m jaanaami, avisayo esa mayha.m. ^b^suta~nca me vessava.nassa santike^eb^ti apica kho upa.t.thaana.m gatena vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa santike sutameta.m mayaa. ^b^sakkassa sahabyata.m gato asayho^eb^ti asayhase.t.thi sakkassa devaanamindassa sahabyata.m gato ahosi, taavati.msabhavane nibbattoti attho.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ^b^alameva kaatu.m kalyaa.na^eb^nti ya.mki~nci kalyaa.na.m kusala.m pu~n~na.m kaatu.m yuttameva patiruupameva. tattha pana ya.m sabbasaadhaara.na.m sukatatara.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``daana.m daatu.m yathaaraha''^eb^nti vutta.m, attano vibhavabalaanuruupa.m daana.m daatu.m alameva. tattha kaara.namaaha ^b^``paa.ni.m kaamadada.m disvaa''^eb^ti. yatra hi naama parakatapu~n~naanumodanapubbakena daanapatinivesanamaggaacikkha.namattena aya.m ^a^V0.0108^ea^ hattho kaamadado di.t.tho, ima.m disvaa. ^b^ko^eb^ ^a^P0.0123^ea^ ^b^pu~n~na.m na karissatii^eb^ti maadiso ko naama attano pati.t.thaanabhuuta.m pu~n~na.m na karissatiiti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ eva.m aniyamavasena pu~n~nakiriyaaya aadara.m dassetvaa idaani attani ta.m niyametvaa dassento ^b^``so hi nuunaa''^eb^tiaadigaathaadvayamaaha. tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so aha.m. ^b^hii^eb^ti avadhaara.ne nipaato, ^b^nuunaa^eb^ti parivitakke. ^b^ito gantvaa^eb^ti ito marubhuumito apagantvaa. ^b^anuppatvaana dvaaraka^eb^nti dvaaravatiinagara.m anupaapu.nitvaa. ^b^pa.t.thapayissaamii^eb^ti pavattayissaami.

[03] eva.m a"nkurena ``daana.m dassaamii''ti pa.ti~n~naaya kataaya yakkho tu.t.thamaanaso ``maarisa, tva.m vissattho daana.m dehi, aha.m pana te sahaayakicca.m karissaami, yena te deyyadhammo na parikkhaya.m gamissati, tena pakaarena karissaamii''ti ta.m daanakiriyaaya samuttejetvaa ``braahma.na vaa.nija, tva.m kira maadise balakkaarena netukaamo attano pamaa.na.m na jaanaasii''ti tassa ^a^M0.0116^ea^ bha.n.damantaradhaapetvaa ta.m yakkhavibhi.msakaaya bhi.msaapento santajjesi. atha na.m a"nkuro naanappakaara.m yaacitvaa braahma.nena khamaapento pasaadetvaa sabbabha.n.da.m paakatika.m kaaraapetvaa rattiyaa upagataaya yakkha.m vissajjetvaa gacchanto tassa aviduure a~n~natara.m ativiya biibhacchadassana.m peta.m disvaa tena katakamma.m pucchanto --
[22] akkhiini ca paggharanti, ki.m paapa.m pakata.m tayaa''ti.. --
[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^ku.naa^eb^ti ku.nikaa pa.tiku.nikaa anujubhuutaa. ^b^ku.naliikata^eb^nti mukhavikaarena viku.nita.m sa.mku.nita.m. ^b^paggharantii^eb^ti asuci.m vissandanti.
[22] akkhiini me paggharanti, ta.m paapa.m pakata.m mayaa''ti.. --

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^``a"ngiirasassaa''^eb^tiaadinaa asayhase.t.thi.m kitteti. ^b^gharamesino^eb^ti gharamaavasantassa gaha.t.thassa. ^b^daanavissagge^eb^ti daanagge pariccaaga.t.thaane. ^b^daane adhikato ahu^eb^nti deyyadhammassa pariccajane daanaadhikaare adhikato .thapito ahosi.m.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekamanta.m apakkammaa^eb^ti yaacanake bhojanatthike aagate disvaa daanabyaava.tena daanaggato anapakkamma yathaa.thaaneyeva .thatvaa sa~njaatapiitisomanassena ^a^M0.0117^ea^ vippasannamukhava.n.nena sahatthena daana.m daatabba.m, parehi vaa patiruupehi daapetabba.m, aha.m pana tathaa akatvaa yaacanake aagacchante duuratova disvaa attaana.m adassento ekamanta.m apakkamma apakkamitvaa. ^b^akaasi.m ku.nali.m mukha^eb^nti viku.nita.m sa"nkucita.m mukha.m akaasi.m.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ ^b^tenaa^eb^ti yasmaa tadaaha.m saaminaa daanaadhikaare niyutto samaano daanakaale upa.t.thite macchariyaapakato daanaggato apakkamanto paadehi sa"nkoca.m aapajji.m, sahatthehi daatabbe tathaa akatvaa hatthasa"nkoca.m aapajji.m, pasannamukhena bhavitabbe mukhasa"nkoca.m aapajji.m, piyacakkhuuhi oloketabbe cakkhukaalusiya.m uppaadesi.m, tasmaa hattha"nguliyo ca ^a^P0.0125^ea^ paada"nguliyo ca ku.nitaa jaataa, mukha~nca ku.naliikata.m viruuparuupa.m sa"nkucita.m, akkhiini asuciiduggandhajegucchaani assuuni paggharantiiti attho. tena vutta.m --
[22] akkhiini me paggharanti, ta.m paapa.m pakata.m mayaa''ti..
[27] akkhiini ca paggharanti, ya.m ta.m parassa daanassa.

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^dhammenaa^eb^ti yutteneva kaara.nena. ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^kaapurisaa^eb^ti laamakapurisa. ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmaa. ^b^parassa daanassaa^eb^ti parassa daanasmi.m. ayameva vaa paa.tho.
[03] puna a"nkuro ta.m daanapati.m se.t.thi.m garahanto --

[25] gaathamaaha. tassattho -- ^b^daana.m^eb^ dadanto puriso ^b^katha~nhi^eb^ naama ta.m ^b^parapattiya.m^eb^ parena paapetabba.m saadhetabba.m ^b^kareyya,^eb^ attapaccakkhameva katvaa sahattheneva ^a^M0.0118^ea^ dadeyya, saya.m vaa tattha byaava.to bhaveyya, a~n~nathaa attano deyyadhammo a.t.thaane viddha.msiyetha, dakkhi.neyyaa ca daanena parihaayeyyunti.
[03] eva.m ^a^P0.0126^ea^ ta.m garahitvaa idaani attanaa pa.tipajjitabbavidhi.m dassento --
[21] ``so hi nuuna ito gantvaa, anuppatvaana dvaaraka.m.
[21] ``ko chaato ko ca tasito, ko vattha.m paridahissati.
[22] kassa santaani yoggaani, ito yojentu vaahana.m..
[21] ``ko chatticchati gandha~nca, ko maala.m ko upaahana.m.
[22] sadaa saaya~nca paato ca, a"ngurassa nivesane''ti.. --
[25] catasso gaathaa a"ngurassa pa.tipatti.m dassetu.m sa"ngiitikaarehi .thapitaa.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tato^eb^ti marukantaarato. ^b^nivattitvaa^eb^ti pa.tinivattitvaa. ^b^anuppatvaana dvaaraka^eb^nti dvaaravatiinagara.m anupaapu.nitvaa. ^b^daana.m pa.t.thapayi a"nguro^eb^ti yakkhena paripuuritasakalako.t.thaagaaro sabbapaatheyyaka.m mahaadaana.m so a"nguro pa.t.thapesi. ^b^ya.mtumassa sukhaavaha^eb^nti ya.m attano sampati aayati~nca sukhanibbattaka.m.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ ^b^ko^eb^ ^a^M0.0119^ea^ ^b^chaato^eb^ti ko jighacchito, so aagantvaa yathaaruci bhu~njatuuti adhippaayo. eseva nayo sesesupi. ^b^tasito^eb^ti ^a^P0.0127^ea^ pipaasito. ^b^paridahissatii^eb^ti nivaasessati paarupissati caati attho. ^b^santaanii^eb^ti parissamappattaani. ^b^yoggaanii^eb^ti rathavaahanaani. ^b^ito yojentu vaahana^eb^nti ito yoggasamuuhato yathaarucita.m gahetvaa vaahana.m yojentu.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ ^b^ko chatticchatii^eb^ti ko kila~njachattaadibheda.m chatta.m icchati, so ga.nhaatuuti adhippaayo. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^gandha^eb^nti catujjaatiyagandhaadika.m gandha.m. ^b^maala^eb^nti ganthitaaganthitabheda.m puppha.m. ^b^upaahana^eb^nti khallabaddhaadibheda.m upaahana.m. ^b^itissuu^eb^ti ettha ^b^suu^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m, iti eva.m ``ko chaato, ko tasito''tiaadinaati attho. ^b^kappakaa^eb^ti nhaapitakaa. ^b^suudaa^eb^ti bhattakaarakaa. ^b^maagadhaa^eb^ti gandhino. ^b^sadaa^eb^ti sabbakaala.m divase divase saaya~nca paato ca tattha a"ngurassa nivesane ghosenti ugghosentiiti yojanaa.

[03] eva.m ^a^V0.0112^ea^ mahaadaana.m pavattentassa gacchante kaale tittibhaavato atthikajanehi pavivitta.m vira.la.m daanagga.m ahosi. ta.m disvaa a"nkuro daane u.laarajjhaasayataaya atu.t.thamaanaso hutvaa attano daane niyutta.m sindhaka.m naama maa.nava.m aamantetvaa --
[21] ``sukha.m supati a"nkuro, iti jaanaati ma.m jano.
[22] dukkha.m supaami sindhaka, ya.m na passaami yaacake..
[21] ``sukha.m supati a"nkuro, iti jaanaati ma.m jano.
[22] dukkha.m supaami sindhaka, appake su vanibbake''ti.. --

[25] gaathaadvayamaaha. tattha ^b^sukha.m supati a"nkuro, iti jaanaati ma.m jano^eb^ti ``a"nkuro raajaa yasabhogasamappito daanapati attano bhogasampattiyaa daanasampattiyaa ca sukha.m supati, sukheneva ^a^P0.0128^ea^ nidda.m upagacchati, sukha.m pa.tibujjhatii''ti eva.m ma.m jano sambhaaveti. ^b^dukkha.m supaami sindhakaa^eb^ti aha.m pana sindhaka dukkhameva supaami. kasmaa? ^b^ya.m na passaami yaacake^eb^ti, yasmaa mama ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m ^a^M0.0120^ea^ deyyadhammapa.tiggaahake bahuu yaacake na passaami, tasmaati attho. ^b^appake su vanibbake^eb^ti vanibbakajane appake katipaye jaate dukkha.m supaamiiti yojanaa. ^b^suu^eb^ti ca nipaatamatta.m, appake vanibbakajane satiiti attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa sindhako tassa u.laara.m daanaadhimutti.m paaka.tatara.m kaatukaamo --
[22] kissa sabbassa lokassa, varamaano vara.m vare''ti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tassattho -- ^b^taavati.msaana.m^eb^ devaana.m ^b^sabbassa^eb^ ca ^b^lokassa issaro sakko^eb^ ``vara.m varassu, a"nkura, ya.mki~nci manasicchita''nti tuyha.m vara.m ^b^dajjaa^eb^ dadeyya ^b^ce, varamaano^eb^ patthayamaano ^b^kissa^eb^ kiidisa.m ^b^vara.m^eb^ vareyyaasiiti attho.
[03] atha a"nkuro attano ajjhaasaya.m yaathaavato pavedento --
[22] dibbaa bhakkhaa paatubhaveyyu.m, siilavanto ca yaacakaa..
[22] dada.m citta.m pasaadeyya.m, eta.m sakka.m vara.m vare''ti.. -- dve gaathaa abhaasi.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^kaalu.t.thitassa me sato^eb^ti kaale paato vu.t.thitassa atthikaana.m dakkhi.neyyaana.m apacaayanapaaricariyaadivasena u.t.thaanaviiriyasampannassa ^a^P0.0129^ea^ me samaanassa. ^b^suuriyuggamana.m patii^eb^ti suuriyuggamanavelaaya.m. ^b^dibbaa bhakkhaa paatubhaveyyu^eb^nti devalokapariyaapannaa aahaaraa uppajjeyyu.m. ^b^siilavanto ca yaacakaa^eb^ti yaacakaa ca siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa bhaveyyu.m.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ ^b^dadato^eb^ ^a^M0.0121^ea^ ^b^me na khiiyethaa^eb^ti aagataagataana.m daana.m dadato ca me deyyadhammo na khiiyetha, na parikkhaya.m gaccheyya. ^b^datvaa naanutapeyyaha^eb^nti ta~nca daana.m datvaa ki~ncideva appasaadaka.m disvaa tena aha.m pacchaa naanutapeyya.m. ^b^dada.m citta.m pasaadeyya^eb^nti dadamaano citta.m pasaadeyya.m, pasannacittoyeva hutvaa dadeyya.m. ^b^eta.m sakka.m vara.m vare^eb^ti sakka.m devaanaminda.m aarogyasampadaa, deyyadhammasampadaa, dakkhi.neyyasampadaa, deyyadhammassa aparimitasampadaa, daayakasampadaati eta.m pa~ncavidha.m vara.m vareyya.m. ettha ca ``kaalu.t.thitassa me sato''ti etena aarogyasampadaa, ``dibbaa bhakkhaa paatubhaveyyu''nti etena deyyadhammasampadaa, ``siilavanto ca yaacakaa''ti etena dakkhi.neyyasampadaa, ``dadato me na khiiyethaa''ti etena deyyadhammassa aparimitasampadaa, ``datvaa naanutapeyyaha.m, dada.m citta.m pasaadeyya''nti etehi daayakasampadaati ime pa~nca atthaa varabhaavena icchitaa. te ca kho daanamayapu~n~nassa yaavadeva u.laarabhaavaayaati veditabbaa.
[03] eva.m a"nkurena attano ajjhaasaye pavedite tattha nisinno niitisatthe kataparicayo sonako naama eko puriso ta.m atidaanato vicchinditukaamo --
[21] ``na sabbavittaani pare pavecche, dadeyya daana~nca dhana~nca rakkhe.
[22] tasmaa hi daanaa dhanameva seyyo, atippadaanena kulaa na honti..
[25] dve gaathaa abhaasi. sindhako eva.m punapi viima.msitukaamo ^b^``na sabbavittaanii''^eb^tiaadimaahaati apare.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sabbavittaanii^eb^ti savi~n~naa.nakaavi~n~naa.nakappabhedaani sabbaani vittuupakara.naani, dhanaaniiti attho. ^b^pare^eb^ti paramhi, parassaati attho ^a^M0.0122^ea^. ^b^na pavecche^eb^ti na dadeyya, ``dakkhi.neyyaa laddhaa''ti katvaa ki~nci asesetvaa sabbasaapateyyapariccaago na kaatabboti attho. ^b^dadeyya daana~ncaa^eb^ti sabbena sabba.m daanadhammo na kaatabbo, atha kho attano aaya~nca vaya~nca jaanitvaa vibhavaanuruupa.m daana~nca dadeyya. ^b^dhana~nca rakkhe^eb^ti aladdhalaabhaladdhaparirakkha.narakkhitasambandhavasena dhana.m paripaaleyya.

[25] vuttavidhinaa vaa dhana.m rakkheyya tammuulakattaa daanassa. tayopi maggaa a~n~nama~n~navisodhanena pa.tisevitabbaati hi niiticintakaa. ^b^tasmaa hii^eb^ti yasmaa dhana~nca rakkhanto daana~nca karonto ubhayalokahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti dhanamuulaka~nca daana.m, tasmaa daanato dhanameva seyyo sundarataroti atidaana.m na kaatabbanti adhippaayo. tenaaha ^b^``atippadaanena kulaa na hontii''^eb^ti, dhanassa pamaa.na.m ajaanitvaa daanassa ta.m nissaaya atippadaanapasa"ngena kulaani na honti nappavattanti, ucchijjantiiti attho.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ idaani vi~n~nuuna.m pasa.msitamevattha.m ^a^P0.0131^ea^ pati.t.thapento ^b^``adaanamatidaana~ncaa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^adaanamatidaana~ncaa^eb^ti sabbena sabba.m ka.tacchubhikkhaayapi ta.n.dulamu.t.thiyaapi adaana.m, pamaa.na.m atikkamitvaa pariccaagasa"nkhaata.m atidaana~nca ^b^pa.n.ditaa^eb^ buddhimanto sapa~n~najaatikaa ^b^nappasa.msanti^eb^ na va.n.nayanti. sabbena sabba.m adaanena hi samparaayikato atthato paribaahiro hoti. atidaanena di.t.thadhammikapave.nii na pavattati. ^b^samena vatteyyaa^eb^ti avisamena ^a^V0.0115^ea^ lokiyasarikkhakena samaahitena majjhimena ~naayena pavatteyya. ^b^sa dhiiradhammo^eb^ti yaa yathaavuttaa daanaadaanappavatti, so dhiiraana.m dhitisampannaana.m niitinayakusalaana.m dhammo, tehi gatamaggoti diipeti.
[03] ta.m ^a^M0.0123^ea^ sutvaa a"nkuro tassa adhippaaya.m parivattento --
[21] ``aho vata re ahameva dajja.m, santo ca ma.m sappurisaa bhajeyyu.m.
[22] datvaa attamano hoti, ta.m ghara.m vasato sukha.m..
[22] datvaa attamano hoti, esaa ya~n~nassa sampadaa..
[22] datvaa attamano hoti, esaa ya~n~nassa sampadaa''ti.. --

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^aho vataa^eb^ti saadhu vata. ^b^re^eb^ti aalapana.m. ^b^ahameva dajja^eb^nti aha.m dajjameva. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho ^a^P0.0132^ea^ -- maa.nava, ``daanaa dhanameva seyyo''ti yadi aya.m niitikusalaana.m vaado tava hotu, kaama.m aha.m dajjameva. ^b^santo ca ma.m sappurisaa bhajeyyu^eb^nti tasmi~nca daane santo upasantakaayavaciimanosamaacaaraa sappurisaa saadhavo ma.m bhajeyyu.m upagaccheyyu.m. ^b^meghova ninnaani paripuurayanto^eb^ti aha.m abhippavassanto mahaamegho viya ninnaani ninna.t.thaanaani sabbesa.m vanibbakaana.m adhippaaye paripuurayanto aho vata te santappeyyanti.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassa yaacanake disvaa^eb^ti yassa puggalassa gharamesino yaacanake disvaa ``pa.thama.m taava upa.t.thita.m vata me pu~n~nakkhetta''nti saddhaajaatassa ^b^mukhava.n.no pasiidati,^eb^ yathaavibhava.m pana tesa.m ^a^V0.0116^ea^ daana.m datvaa ^b^attamano^eb^ piitisomanassehi gahitacitto hoti. ^b^ta^eb^nti yadettha yaacakaana.m dassana.m ^a^M0.0124^ea^, tena ca disvaa cittassa pasaadana.m, yathaaraha.m daana.m datvaa ca attamanataa.
[03] 304^b^.^eb^ ^b^esaa ya~n~nassa sampadaa^eb^ti esaa ya~n~nassa sampatti paaripuuri, nipphattiiti attho.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ ^b^pubbeva daanaa sumano^eb^ti ``sampattiina.m nidaana.m anugaamika.m nidhaana.m nidhessaamii''ti mu~ncanacetanaaya pubbe eva daanuupakara.nassa sampaadanato pa.t.thaaya sumano somanassajaato bhaveyya. ^b^dada.m citta.m pasaadaye^eb^ti dadanto deyyadhamma.m dakkhi.neyyahatthe pati.t.thaapento ``asaarato dhanato saaraadaana.m karomii''ti attano citta.m pasaadeyya. ^b^datvaa attamano hotii^eb^ti dakkhi.neyyaana.m deyyadhamma.m pariccajitvaa ``pa.n.ditapa~n~natta.m naama mayaa anu.t.thita.m, aho saadhu su.t.thuu''ti attamano pamuditamano piitisomanassajaato hoti. ^b^esaa ya~n~nassa sampadaa^eb^ti yaa ^a^P0.0133^ea^ aya.m pubbacetanaa mu~njacetanaa aparacetanaati imesa.m kammaphalasaddhaanugataana.m somanassapariggahitaana.m tissanna.m cetanaana.m paaripuuri, esaa ya~n~nassa sampadaa daanassa sampatti, na ito a~n~nathaati adhippaayo.

[03] eva.m a"nkuro attano pa.tipajjanavidhi.m pakaasetvaa bhiyyosomattaaya abhiva.d.dhamaanadaanajjhaasayo divase divase mahaadaana.m pavattesi. tena tadaa sabbarajjaani unna"ngalaani katvaa mahaadaane diyyamaane pa.tiladdhasabbuupakara.naa manussaa attano attano kammante pahaaya yathaasukha.m vicari.msu, tena raajuuna.m ko.t.thaagaaraani parikkhaya.m agama.msu. tato raajaano a"nkurassa duuta.m paahesu.m -- ``bhoto daana.m nissaaya amhaaka.m aayassa vinaaso ahosi, ko.t.thaagaaraani parikkhaya.m gataani, tattha yuttamatta.m ~naatabba''nti.

[01] ta.m sutvaa a"nkuro dakkhi.naapatha.m gantvaa dami.lavisaye samuddassa aviduura.t.thaane mahatiyo anekadaanasaalaayo kaaraapetvaa mahaadaanaani pavattento yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m ^a^M0.0125^ea^ mara.naa taavati.msabhavane nibbatti. tassa daanavibhuuti~nca sagguupapatti~nca dassento sa"ngiitikaaraa --
[21] ``bahuu maase ca pakkhe ca, utusa.mvaccharaani ca.
[22] so hitvaa maanusa.m deha.m, taavati.msuupago ahuu''ti.. -- gaathaa aaha.msu.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ tatha ^b^sa.t.thi vaahasahassaanii^eb^ti vaahaana.m sa.t.thisahassaani gandhasaalita.n.dulaadipuuritavaahaana.m sa.t.thisahassaani. ^b^pu~n~napekkhassa^eb^ daanajjhaasayassa daanaadhimuttassa ^b^a"nkurassa nivesane nicca.m^eb^ divase divase ^b^jantuno^eb^ sattakaayassa ^b^bhojana.m diiyate^eb^ti yojanaa.

[03] 307-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^tisahassaani suudaa hii^eb^ti tisahassamattaa suudaa bhattakaarakaa. te ca kho pana padhaanabhuutaa adhippetaa, tesu ekamekassa pana ^a^M0.0126^ea^ vacanakaraa anekaati veditabbaa. ``tisahassaani suudaana''nti ca pa.thanti. ^b^aamuttama.niku.n.dalaa^eb^ti naanaama.nivicittaku.n.daladharaa. nidassanamatta~nceta.m, aamuttaka.takaka.tisuttaadiaabhara.naapi te ahesu.m. ^b^a"nkura.m upajiivantii^eb^ti ta.m upanissaaya ^a^V0.0118^ea^ jiivanti, tappa.tibaddhajiivikaa hontiiti attho. ^b^daane ya~n~nassa vaava.taa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0135^ea^ mahaayaagasa~n~nitassa ya~n~nassa daane yajane vaava.taa ussukka.m aapannaa. ^b^ka.t.tha.m phaalenti maa.navaa^eb^ti naanappakaaraana.m khajjabhojjaadiaahaaravisesaana.m pacanaaya ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa taru.namanussaa ka.t.thaani phaalenti vidaalenti.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahu^eb^nti mahanta.m pahuutika.m. ^b^bahuuna^eb^nti anekesa.m. ^b^paadaasii^eb^ti pakaarehi adaasi. ^b^ciira^eb^nti cirakaala.m. viisativassasahassaayukesu hi manussesu so uppanno. bahu.m bahuuna.m cirakaala~nca dento yathaa adaasi, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``sakkacca~ncaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^sakkacca^eb^nti saadara.m, anapaviddha.m anava~n~naata.m katvaa. ^b^sahatthaa^eb^ti sahatthena, na aa.naapanamattena. ^b^cittiikatvaa^eb^ti gaaravabahumaanayogena cittena karitvaa puujetvaa. ^b^punappuna^eb^nti bahuso na ekavaara.m, katipayavaare vaa akatvaa anekavaara.m paadaasiiti yojanaa.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ idaani tameva punappuna.m kara.na.m vibhaavetu.m ^b^``bahuu maase caa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha.msu. tattha ^b^bahuu maase^eb^ti cittamaasaadike bahuu aneke maase. ^b^pakkhe^eb^ti ka.nhasukkabhede bahuu pakkhe. ^b^utusa.mvaccharaani caa^eb^ti vasantagimhaadike bahuu utuu ca sa.mvaccharaani ca, sabbattha accantasa.myoge upayogavacana.m. ^b^diighamantara^eb^nti diighakaalamantara.m. ettha ca ``cira.m paadaasii''ti cirakaala.m daanassa pavattitabhaava.m vatvaa puna tassa nirantarameva ^a^P0.0136^ea^ pavattitabhaava.m dassetu.m ``bahuu maase''tiaadi vuttanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva^eb^nti ^a^M0.0127^ea^ vuttappakaarena. ^b^datvaa yajitvaa caa^eb^ti atthato ekameva, kesa~nci dakkhi.neyyaana.m ekaccassa deyyadhammassa pariccajanavasena datvaa, puna ``bahu.m bahuuna.m paadaasii''ti vuttanayena atthikaana.m sabbesa.m yathaakaama.m dento mahaayaagavasena yajitvaa. ^b^so hitvaa maanusa.m deha.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0119^ea^, ^b^taavati.msuupago ahuu^eb^ti so a"nkuro aayupariyosaane manussatthabhaava.m pahaaya pa.tisandhiggaha.navasena taavati.msadevanikaayuupago ahosi.

[03] eva.m tasmi.m taavati.msesu nibbattitvaa dibbasampatti.m anubhavante amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale indako naama maa.navo aayasmato anuruddhattherassa pi.n.daaya carantassa pasannamaanaso ka.tacchubhikkha.m daapesi. so aparena samayena kaala.m katvaa khettagatassa pu~n~nassa aanubhaavena taavati.msesu mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo devaputto hutvaa nibbatto dibbehi ruupaadiihi dasahi .thaanehi a"nkura.m devaputta.m abhibhavitvaa virocati. tena vutta.m --
[22] so hitvaa maanusa.m deha.m, taavati.msuupago ahu..
[22] ruupe sadde rase gandhe, pho.t.thabbe ca manorame..
[21] ``aayunaa yasasaa ceva, va.n.nena ca sukhena ca.

[03] 314-5^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ruupe^eb^ti ruupahetu, attano ruupasampattinimittanti attho. ^b^sadde^eb^tiaadiisupi eseva nayo. ^b^aayunaa^eb^ti jiivitena. nanu ca devaana.m jiivita.m paricchinnappamaa.na.m vutta.m. sacca.m vutta.m, ta.m pana yebhuyyavasena. tathaa hi ekaccaana.m devaana.m yogavipattiaadinaa antaraamara.na.m hotiyeva. indako pana tisso vassako.tiyo sa.t.thi ca vassasahassaani paripuuretiyeva. tena vutta.m ``aayunaa atirocatii''ti. ^b^yasasaa^eb^ti mahatiyaa parivaarasampattiyaa ^a^P0.0137^ea^. ^b^va.n.nenaa^eb^ti sa.n.thaanasampattiyaa. va.n.nadhaatusampadaa pana ``ruupe''ti iminaa vuttaayeva. ^b^aadhipaccenaa^eb^ti issariyena.

[03] eva.m a"nkure ca indake ca taavati.msesu nibbattitvaa dibbasampatti.m anubhavantesu amhaaka.m bhagavaa abhisambodhito sattame sa.mvacchare aasaa.lhipu.n.namaaya.m ^a^M0.0128^ea^ saavatthinagaradvaare ka.n.dambarukkhamuule yamakapaa.tihaariya.m katvaa anukkamena tipadavikkamena taavati.msabhavana.m gantvaa paaricchattakamuule ^a^V0.0120^ea^ pa.n.dukambalasilaaya.m yugandharapabbate baalasuuriyo viya virocamaano dasahi lokadhaatuuhi sannipatitaaya devabrahmaparisaaya juti.m attano sariirappabhaaya abhibhavanto abhidhamma.m desetu.m nisinno aviduure nisinna.m indaka.m, dvaadasayojanantare nisinna.m a"nkura~nca disvaa dakkhi.neyyasampattivibhaavanattha.m --

[25] gaathamaaha. ta.m sutvaa a"nkuro ``bhagavaa mayaa cirakaala.m bahu.m deyyadhamma.m pariccajitvaa pavattitampi mahaadaana.m dakkhi.neyyasampattivirahena akhette vuttabiija.m viya na u.laaraphala.m ahosi, indakassa pana ka.tacchubhikkhaadaanampi dakkhi.neyyasampattiyaa sukhette vuttabiija.m viya ativiya u.laaraphala.m jaata''nti aaha. tamattha.m dassente sa"ngiitikaaraa --
[21] ``yojanaani ^a^P0.0138^ea^ dasa dve ca, a"nkuroya.m tadaa ahu.
[22] ki.m mayha.m tena daanena, dakkhi.neyyena su~n~nata.m..
[21] ``aya.m so indako yakkho, dajjaa daana.m parittaka.m.
[22] na vipula.m phala.m hoti, napi toseti kassaka.m..
[22] na vipula.m phala.m hoti, napi toseti daayaka.m..
[22] sammaa dhaara.m pavecchante, phala.m tosesi kassaka.m..
[22] appakampi kata.m kaara.m, pu~n~na.m hoti mahapphala''nti.. -- gaathaayo avocu.m.
[03] 317^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^taavati.mse^eb^ti taavati.msabhavane. ^b^silaaya.m pa.n.dukambale^eb^ti pa.n.dukambalanaamake silaasane purisuttamo buddho yadaa vihaasiiti yojanaa.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ^b^dasasu lokadhaatuusu, sannipatitvaana devataa^eb^ti jaatikhettasa~n~nitesu dasasu cakkavaa.lasahassesu kaamaavacaradevataa brahmadevataa ca buddhassa bhagavato payirupaasanaaya dhammassavanattha~nca ekato sannipatitvaa. tenaaha ^b^``payirupaasanti sambuddha.m, vasanta.m nagamuddhanii''^eb^ti, sinerumuddhaniiti attho.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ^b^yojanaani^eb^ ^a^V0.0122^ea^ ^a^P0.0139^ea^ ^b^dasa dve ca, a"nkuroya.m tadaa ahuu^eb^ti aya.m yathaavuttacarito a"nkuro tadaa satthu sammukhakaale dasa dve yojanaani antara.m katvaa ahu. satthu nisinna.t.thaanato dvaadasayojanantare .thaane nisinno ahosiiti attho.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ^b^codito^eb^ ^a^M0.0130^ea^ ^b^bhaavitattenaa^eb^ti paaramiparibhaavitaaya ariyamaggabhaavanaaya bhaavitattena sammaasambuddhena codito. ^b^ki.m mayha.m tenaa^eb^tiaadikaa satthu pa.tivacanavasena a"nkurena vuttagaathaa. ^b^dakkhi.neyyena su~n~nata^eb^nti ya.m dakkhi.neyyena su~n~nata.m rittaka.m virahita.m tadaa mama daana.m, tasmaa ``ki.m mayha.m tenaa''ti attano daanapu~n~na.m hii.lento vadati.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ^b^yakkho^eb^ti devaputto. ^b^dajjaa^eb^ti datvaa. ^b^atirocati amhehii^eb^ti attanaa maadisehi ativiya virocati. ^b^hii^eb^ti vaa nipaatamatta.m, amhe atikkamitvaa abhibhavitvaa virocatiiti attho. yathaa kinti aaha ^b^``cando taaraga.ne yathaa''^eb^ti.

[03] 325-6^b^.^eb^ ^b^ujja"ngale^eb^ti ativiya thaddhabhuumibhaage. ``uusare''ti keci vadanti. ^b^ropita^eb^nti vutta.m, vapitvaa vaa uddharitvaa vaa puna ropita.m. ^b^napi tosetii^eb^ti na nandayati, appaphalataaya vaa tu.t.thi.m na janeti. ^b^tathevaa^eb^ti yathaa ujja"ngale khette bahumpi biija.m ropita.m vipulaphala.m u.laaraphala.m na hoti, tato eva kassaka.m na toseti, tathaa dussiilesu siilavirahitesu bahukampi daana.m pati.t.thaapita.m vipulaphala.m mahapphala.m na hoti, tato eva daayaka.m na tosetiiti attho.

[03] 327-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathaapi bhaddake^eb^ti gaathaadvayassa vattavipariyaayena atthayojanaa veditabbaa. tattha ^b^sammaa dhaara.m pavecchante^eb^ti vu.t.thidhaara.m sammadeva pavattente, anva.d.dhamaasa.m anudasaaha.m anupa~ncaaha.m deve vassanteti attho. ^b^gu.navantesuu^eb^ti jhaanaadigu.nayuttesu. ^b^taadisuu^eb^ti i.t.thaadiisu ^a^P0.0140^ea^ taadilakkha.nappattesu. ^b^kaara^eb^nti li"ngavipallaasena vutta.m, upakaaroti attho. kiidiso upakaaroti aaha ^b^``pu~n~na''^eb^nti.
[22] viceyya daana.m datvaana, sagga.m gacchanti daayakaa..
[21] ``viceyya ^a^V0.0123^ea^ daana.m sugatappasa.t.tha.m, ye dakkhi.neyyaa idha jiivaloke.
[22] etesu dinnaani mahapphalaani, biijaani vuttaani yathaa sukhette''ti.. --
[03] 329^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0131^ea^ ^b^viceyyaa^eb^ti vicinitvaa, pu~n~nakkhetta.m pa~n~naaya upaparikkhitvaa. sesa.m sabbattha uttaanamevaati.

[03] tayida.m a"nkurapetavatthu satthaaraa taavati.msabhavane dasasahassacakkavaa.ladevataana.m purato dakkhi.neyyasampattivibhaavanattha.m ``mahaadaana.m tayaa dinna''ntiaadinaa attanaa samu.t.thaapita.m, tattha tayo maase abhidhamma.m desetvaa mahaapavaara.naaya devaga.naparivuto devadevo devalokato sa"nkassanagara.m otaritvaa anukkamena saavatthi.m patvaa jetavane viharanto catuparisamajjhe dakkhi.neyyasampattivibhaavanatthameva ``yassa atthaaya gacchaamaa''tiaadinaa vitthaarato desetvaa catusaccakathaaya desanaaya kuu.ta.m ga.nhi. desanaavasaane tesa.m anekako.tipaa.nasahassaana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^divaavihaaragata.m bhikkhu^eb^nti ida.m uttaramaatupetivatthu. tatraaya.m atthavibhaavanaa -- satthari parinibbute pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitiyaa pavattitaaya aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano dvaadasahi ^a^P0.0141^ea^ bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m kosambiyaa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m ara~n~naayatane vihaasi. tena ca samayena ra~n~no udenassa a~n~nataro amacco kaalamakaasi, tena ca pubbe nagare kammantaa adhi.t.thitaa ahesu.m. atha raajaa tassa putta.m uttara.m naama maa.nava.m pakkosaapetvaa ``tva~nca pitaraa adhi.t.thite kammante samanusaasaa''ti tena .thita.t.thaane .thapesi.

[03] so ca saadhuuti sampa.ticchitvaa ekadivasa.m nagarapa.tisa"nkhara.niyaana.m daaruuna.m atthaaya va.d.dhakiyo gahetvaa ara~n~na.m gato. tattha aayasmato mahaakaccaayanattherassa vasana.t.thaana.m upagantvaa thera.m tattha pa.msukuulaciivaradhara.m vivitta.m nisinna.m disvaa iriyaapatheyeva pasiiditvaa katapa.tisanthaaro vanditvaa ^a^V0.0124^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. thero tassa dhamma.m kathesi. so dhamma.m ^a^M0.0132^ea^ sutvaa ratanattaye sa~njaatappasaado sara.nesu pati.t.thaaya thera.m nimantesi -- ``adhivaasetha me, bhante, svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhuuhi anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi thero tu.nhiibhaavena. so tato nikkhamitvaa nagara.m gantvaa a~n~nesa.m upaasakaana.m aacikkhi -- ``thero mayaa svaatanaaya nimantito, tumhehipi mama daanagga.m aagantabba''nti.

[03] so dutiyadivase kaalasseva pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa kaala.m aarocaapetvaa saddhi.m bhikkhuuhi aagacchantassa therassa paccuggamana.m katvaa vanditvaa purakkhatvaa geha.m pavesesi. atha mahaarahakappiyapaccatthara.naatthatesu aasanesu there ca bhikkhuusu ca nisinnesu gandhapupphadhuupehi puuja.m katvaa pa.niitena annapaanena te santappetvaa sa~njaatappasaado kata~njalii anumodana.m su.nitvaa katabhattaanumodane there gacchante patta.m gahetvaa anugacchanto nagarato nikkhamitvaa pa.tinivattanto ``bhante, tumhehi nicca.m mama geha.m pavisitabba''nti yaacitvaa therassa adhivaasana.m ~natvaa nivatti. eva.m so thera.m upa.t.thahanto tassa ovaade pati.t.thaaya ^a^P0.0142^ea^ sotaapattiphala.m paapu.ni, vihaara~nca kaaresi, sabbe ca attano ~naatake saasane abhippasanne akaasi.

[03] maataa panassa maccheramalapariyu.t.thitacittaa hutvaa eva.m paribhaasi -- ``ya.m tva.m mama anicchantiyaa eva sama.naana.m annapaana.m desi, ta.m te paraloke lohita.m sampajjatuu''ti. eka.m pana morapi~nchakalaapa.m vihaaramahadivase diyyamaana.m anujaani. saa kaala.m katvaa petayoniya.m uppajji, morapi~nchakalaapadaanaanumodanena panassaa kesaa niilaa siniddhaa vellitaggaa sukhumaa diighaa ca ahesu.m. saa yadaa ga"ngaanadi.m ``paaniiya.m pivissaamii''ti otarati, tadaa nadii lohitapuuraa hoti. saa pa~ncapa.n.naasa vassaani khuppipaasaabhibhuutaa vicaritvaa ekadivasa.m ka"nkhaarevatatthera.m ga"ngaaya tiire divaavihaara.m nisinna.m disvaa attaana.m attano kesehi pa.ticchaadetvaa upasa"nkamitvaa paaniiya.m yaaci. ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m --
[25] imaa dve gaathaa sa"ngiitikaarakehi idha aadito .thapitaa.

[03] tattha ^b^bhiirudassanaa^eb^ti bhayaanakadassanaa. ``ruddadassanaa''ti vaa paa.tho, biibhacchabhaariyadassanaati attho. ^b^yaavabhuumaavalambare^eb^ti yaava bhuumi, taava olambanti. pubbe ``bhikkhu''nti ca pacchaa ``sama.na''nti ca ka"nkhaarevatattherameva sandhaaya vutta.m.
[03] saa pana petii thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa paaniiya.m yaacantii --
[27] naabhijaanaami ^a^P0.0143^ea^ bhutta.m vaa, piita.m vaa pana paaniya.m.
[22] dehi tva.m paaniya.m bhante, tasitaa paaniyaaya me''ti.. -- ima.m gaathamaaha.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^naabhijaanaami bhutta.m vaa^eb^ti eva.m diighamantare kaale bhojana.m bhutta.m vaa paaniiya.m piita.m vaa naabhijaanaami, na bhutta.m na piitanti attho. ^b^tasitaa^eb^ti pipaasitaa. ^b^paaniyaayaa^eb^ti paaniiyatthaaya aahi.n.dantiyaa me paaniiya.m dehi, bhanteti yojanaa.
[22] piva etto gahetvaana, ki.m ma.m yaacasi paaniya.m..
[22] lohita.m me parivattati, tasmaa yaacaami paaniya.m..
[21] ``ki.m nu kaayena vaacaaya, manasaa dukka.ta.m kata.m.
[21] ``putto ^a^V0.0126^ea^ me uttaro naama, saddho aasi upaasako.
[22] so ca mayha.m akaamaaya, sama.naana.m pavecchati..
[25] imaa therassa ca petiyaa ca vacanapa.tivacanagaathaa.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^himavantato^eb^ti mahato himassa atthitaaya ``himavaa''ti laddhanaamato pabbataraajato. ^b^sandatii^eb^ti pavattati. ^b^etto^eb^ti ito mahaaga"ngaato. ^b^ki^eb^nti kasmaa ma.m yaacasi paaniiya.m, ga"ngaanadi.m otaritvaa yathaaruci pivaati dasseti.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ^b^lohita.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0144^ea^ ^b^me parivattatii^eb^ti udaka.m sandamaana.m mayha.m paapakammaphalena lohita.m hutvaa parivattati pari.namati, taaya gahitamatta.m udaka.m lohita.m jaayati.

[03] 337-40^b^.^eb^ ^b^mayha.m akaamaayaa^eb^ti mama anicchantiyaa. ^b^pavecchatii^eb^ti deti. ^b^paccaya^eb^nti gilaanapaccaya.m. ^b^eta^eb^nti ya.m eta.m ciivaraadika.m paccayajaata.m sama.naana.m pavecchasi desi, eta.m te paralokasmi.m lohita.m hotu uttaraati abhisapanavasena kata.m paapakamma.m, tassa vipaakenaati yojanaa.

[03] athaayasmaa revato ta.m peti.m uddissa bhikkhusa"nghassa paaniiya.m adaasi, pi.n.daaya caritvaa bhatta.m gahetvaa bhikkhuunamadaasi, sa"nkaarakuu.taadito pa.msukuula.m gahetvaa dhovitvaa bhisi~nca cimilika~nca katvaa bhikkhuuna.m adaasi, tena cassaa petiyaa dibbasampattiyo ahesu.m. saa therassa ^a^V0.0127^ea^ santika.m gantvaa attanaa laddhadibbasampatti.m therassa dassesi. thero ta.m pavatti.m attano santika.m upagataana.m catunna.m parisaana.m pakaasetvaa dhammakatha.m ^a^M0.0135^ea^ kathesi. tena mahaajano sa~njaatasa.mvego vigatamalamacchero hutvaa daanasiilaadikusaladhammaabhirato ahosiiti. ida.m pana petavatthu dutiyasa"ngiitiya.m sa"ngaha.m aaru.lhanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^aha.m pure pabbajitassa bhikkhuno^eb^ti ida.m suttapetavatthu. tassa kaa uppatti? saavatthiyaa kira aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m gaamake amhaaka.m satthari anuppanneyeva sattanna.m vassasataana.m upari a~n~nataro daarako eka.m paccekabuddha.m upa.t.thahi. tassa maataa tasmi.m vayappatte tassatthaaya samaanakulato a~n~natara.m kuladhiitara.m aanesi. vivaahadivaseyeva ca so kumaaro sahaayehi saddhi.m nhaayitu.m gato ahinaa da.t.tho kaalamakaasi, ``yakkhagaahenaa''tipi ^a^P0.0145^ea^ vadanti. so paccekabuddhassa upa.t.thaanena bahu.m kusalakamma.m katvaa .thitopi tassaa daarikaaya pa.tibaddhacittataaya vimaanapeto hutvaa nibbatti, mahiddhiko pana ahosi mahaanubhaavo.

[03] atha so ta.m daarika.m attano vimaana.m netukaamo ``kena nu kho upaayena esaa di.t.thadhammavedaniiyakamma.m katvaa mayaa saddhi.m idha abhirameyyaa''ti tassaa dibbabhogasampattiyaa anubhavanahetu.m viima.msanto paccekabuddha.m ciivarakamma.m karonta.m disvaa manussaruupena gantvaa vanditvaa ``ki.m, bhante, suttakena attho atthii''ti aaha. ``ciivarakamma.m karomi, upaasakaa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante, asukasmi.m .thaane suttabhikkha.m carathaa''ti tassaa daarikaaya geha.m dassesi. paccekabuddho tattha gantvaa gharadvaare a.t.thaasi. atha saa paccekabuddha.m tattha .thita.m disvaa pasannamaanasaa ``suttakena me ayyo atthiko''ti ~natvaa eka.m suttagu.la.m adaasi. atha so amanusso manussaruupena tassa daarikaaya ghara.m gantvaa tassaa maatara.m yaacitvaa taaya saddhi.m katipaaha.m vasitvaa tassaa maatuyaa anuggahattha.m tasmi.m gehe sabbabhaajanaani hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa puuretvaa sabbattha upari naama.m likhi ``ida.m devadattiya.m dhana.m na kenaci gahetabba''nti, ta~nca daarika.m gahetvaa attano ^a^M0.0136^ea^ vimaana.m agamaasi. tassaa maataa pahuuta.m dhana.m labhitvaa attano ~naatakaana.m kapa.naddhikaadina~nca datvaa attanaa ca paribhu~njitvaa kaala.m karontii ``mama dhiitaa aagacchati ce, ida.m dhana.m dassethaa''ti ~naatakaana.m kathetvaa kaalamakaasi.

[03] tato ^a^V0.0128^ea^ sattanna.m vassasataana.m accayena amhaaka.m bhagavati loke uppajjitvaa pavattitavaradhammacakke anukkamena saavatthiya.m viharante tassaa itthiyaa tena amanussena saddhi.m vasantiyaa ukka.n.thaa uppajji. saa ta.m ``saadhu, ayyaputta, ma.m saka~n~neva geha.m pa.tinehii''ti vadantii --
[22] saaha.m bhu~njaami ca paarupaami ca, pahuutavittaa na ca taava khiiyati..
[22] saaha.m gantvaa punadeva maanusa.m, kaahaami pu~n~naani nayayyaputta ma''nti.. --

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^``pabbajitassa bhikkhuno''^eb^ti ida.m paccekabuddha.m saddhaaya vutta.m. so hi kaamaadimalaana.m attano santaanato anavasesato pabbaajitattaa pahiinattaa paramatthato ``pabbajito''ti, bhinnakilesattaa ``bhikkhuu''ti ca vattabbata.m arahati. ^b^sutta^eb^nti kappaasiyasutta.m. ^b^upasa"nkammaa^eb^ti mayha.m geha.m upasa"nkamitvaa. ^b^yaacitaa^eb^ti ``uddissa ariyaa ti.t.thanti, esaa ariyaana yaacanaa''ti (jaa0 1.7.59) eva.m vuttaaya kaayavi~n~nattipayogasa"nkhaataaya bhikkhaacariyaaya ^a^M0.0137^ea^ yaacitaa. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti tassa suttadaanassa. ^b^vipaako vipulaphaluupalabbhatii^eb^ti vipulaphalo u.laaraudayo mahaaudayo vipaako etarahi upalabbhati paccanubhaviiyati. ^b^bahukaa^eb^ti anekaa. ^b^vatthako.tiyo^eb^ti vatthaana.m ko.tiyo, anekasatasahassapabhedaani vatthaaniiti attho.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ ^b^anekacitta^eb^nti ^a^P0.0147^ea^ naanaavidhacittakamma.m, anekehi vaa muttaama.niaadiihi ratanehi vicittaruupa.m. ^b^naranaarisevita^eb^nti paricaarakabhuutehi narehi naariihi ca upasevita.m. ^b^saaha.m bhu~njaamii^eb^ti ^a^V0.0129^ea^ saa aha.m ta.m vimaana.m paribhu~njaami. ^b^paarupaamii^eb^ti anekaasu vatthako.tiisu icchiticchita.m nivaasemi ceva paridahaami ca. ^b^pahuutavittaa^eb^ti pahuutavittuupakara.naa mahaddhanaa mahaabhogaa. ^b^na ca taava khiiyatii^eb^ti ta~nca vitta.m na khiiyati, na parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gacchati.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasseva kammassa vipaakamanvayaa^eb^ti tasseva suttadaanamayapu~n~nakammassa anvayaa paccayaa hetubhaavena vipaakabhuuta.m ^b^sukha.m,^eb^ i.t.thamadhurasa"nkhaata.m ^b^saata~nca idha^eb^ imasmi.m vimaane ^b^upalabbhati. gantvaa punadeva maanusa^eb^nti puna eva manussaloka.m upagantvaa. ^b^kaahaami pu~n~naanii^eb^ti mayha.m sukhavisesanipphaadakaani pu~n~naani karissaami, yesa.m vaa mayaa aya.m sampatti laddhaati adhippaayo. ^b^nayayyaputta ma^eb^nti, ayyaputta, ma.m manussaloka.m naya, nehiiti attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa so amanusso tassaa pa.tibaddhacittataaya anukampaaya gamana.m anicchanto --
[27] ji.n.naa ca vu.d.dhaa ca tahi.m bhavissasi.

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^sattaa^eb^ti vibhattilopena niddeso, nissakke vaa eta.m paccattavacana.m. ^b^vassasataa^eb^ti vassasatato, sattahi vassasatehi uddha.m tuva.m idhaagataa ima.m vimaana.m aagataa, idhaagataaya tuyha.m satta vassasataani ^a^M0.0138^ea^ hontiiti attho. ^b^ji.n.naa ca^eb^ ^a^P0.0148^ea^ ^b^vu.d.dhaa ca tahi.m bhavissasii^eb^ti idha dibbehi utuaahaarehi upathambhitattabhaavaa kammaanubhaavena ettaka.m kaala.m daharaakaareneva .thitaa. ito pana gataa kammassa ca parikkhii.nattaa manussaana~nca utuaahaaravasena jaraaji.n.naa vayovu.d.dhaa ca tahi.m manussaloke bhavissasi. kinti? ^b^sabbeva te kaalakataa ca ~naatakaa^eb^ti diighassa addhuno gatattaa tava ~naatayopi sabbe eva mataa, tasmaa ito devalokato tattha manussaloka.m gantvaa ki.m karissasi, avasesampi aayu~nca idheva khepehi, idha vasaahiiti adhippaayo.
[03] eva.m tena vuttaa saa tassa vacana.m asaddahantii punadeva --
[21] ``satteva ^a^V0.0130^ea^ vassaani idhaagataaya me, dibba~nca sukha~nca samappitaaya.
[22] saaha.m gantvaa punadeva maanusa.m, kaahaami pu~n~naani nayayyaputta ma''nti.. --

[25] gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^satteva vassaani idhaagataaya me^eb^ti, ayyaputta, mayha.m idhaagataaya satteva vassaani ma~n~ne viitivattaani. satta vassasataani dibbasukhasamappitaaya bahumpi kaala.m gata.m asallakkhentii evamaaha.

[03] eva.m pana taaya vutto so vimaanapeto naanappakaara.m ta.m anusaasitvaa ``tva.m idaani sattaahato uttari tattha na jiivissasi, maatuyaa te nikkhitta.m mayaa dinna.m dhana.m atthi, ta.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m datvaa idheva uppatti.m patthehii''ti vatvaa ta.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa gaamamajjhe .thapetvaa ``idhaagate a~n~nepi jane `yathaabala.m pu~n~naani karothaa'ti ovadeyyaasii''ti vatvaa gato. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``so ^a^P0.0149^ea^ ta.m gahetvaana pasayha baahaaya.m, paccaanayitvaana theri.m sudubbala.m.
[22] vajjesi `a~n~nampi jana.m idhaagata.m, karotha pu~n~naani sukhuupalabbhatii'''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so vimaanapeto. ^b^ta^eb^nti ta.m itthi.m. ^b^gahetvaana pasayha baahaaya^eb^nti pasayha netaa viya baahaaya.m ta.m gahetvaa. ^b^paccaanayitvaanaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0139^ea^ tassaa jaatasa.mvu.d.dhagaama.m punadeva aanayitvaa. ^b^theri^eb^nti thaavari.m, ji.n.na.m vu.d.dhanti attho. ^b^sudubbala^eb^nti jaraaji.n.nataaya eva su.t.thu dubbala.m. saa kira tato vimaanato apagamanasamanantarameva ji.n.naa vu.d.dhaa mahallikaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa ahosi. ^b^vajjesii^eb^ti vadeyyaasi. vattabbavacanaakaara~nca dassetu.m ^b^``a~n~nampi jana''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tassattho -- bhadde, tvampi pu~n~na.m kareyyaasi, a~n~nampi jana.m idha tava dassanatthaaya aagata.m ``bhadramukhaa, aaditta.m siisa.m vaa cela.m vaa ajjhupekkhitvaapi daanasiilaadiini pu~n~naani karothaati, kate ca pu~n~ne eka.mseneva tassa phalabhuuta.m sukha.m upalabbhati, na ettha sa.msayo kaatabbo''ti vadeyyaasi ovadeyyaasiiti.

[03] eva~nca vatvaa tasmi.m gate saa itthii attano ~naatakaana.m vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa tesa.m attaana.m jaanaapetvaa tehi niyyaaditadhana.m gahetvaa sama.nabraahma.naana.m daana.m dentii attano santika.m aagataagataana.m --
[21] ``di.t.thaa ^a^V0.0131^ea^ mayaa akatena saadhunaa, petaa viha~n~nanti tatheva manussaa.
[22] kamma~nca ^a^P0.0150^ea^ katvaa sukhavedaniiya.m, devaa manussaa ca sukhe .thitaa pajaa''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^akatenaa^eb^ti anibbattitena attanaa anupacitena. ^b^saadhunaa^eb^ti kusalakammena, itthambhuutalakkha.ne kara.navacana.m. ^b^viha~n~nantii^eb^ti vighaata.m aapajjanti. ^b^sukhavedaniiya^eb^nti sukhavipaaka.m pu~n~nakamma.m. ^b^sukhe .thitaa^eb^ti sukhe pati.t.thitaa. ``sukhedhitaa''ti vaa paa.tho, sukhena abhivu.d.dhaa phiitaati attho. aya~nhettha adhippaayo -- yathaa petaa tatheva manussaa akatena kusalena, katena ca akusalena viha~n~namaanaa khuppipaasaadinaa vighaata.m aapajjantaa mahaadukkha.m anubhavantaa di.t.thaa mayaa. sukhavedaniiya.m pana kamma.m katvaa tena katena kusalakammena, akatena ca akusalakammena devamanussapariyaapannaa pajaa sukhe .thitaa di.t.thaa mayaa, attapaccakkhameta.m, tasmaa paapa.m duuratova parivajjentaa pu~n~nakiriyaaya yuttapayuttaa hothaati.

[03] eva.m pana ovaada.m dentii sama.nabraahma.naadiina.m sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa sattame divase kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu nibbatti. bhikkhuu ta.m pavatti.m bhagavato aarocesu.m. bhagavaa tamattha.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa sampattaparisaaya ^a^M0.0140^ea^ dhamma.m desesi, visesato ca paccekabuddhesu pavattitadaanassa mahapphalata.m mahaanisa.msata~nca pakaasesi. ta.m sutvaa mahaajano vigatamalamacchero daanaadipu~n~naabhirato ahosiiti.

[03] ^b^so.n.nasopaanaphalakaa^eb^ti ida.m satthari saavatthiya.m viharante ka.n.namu.n.dapeti.m aarabbha vutta.m. atiite kira ^a^P0.0151^ea^ kassapabuddhakaale kimilanagare a~n~nataro upaasako sotaapanno pa~ncahi upaasakasatehi saddhi.m samaanacchando hutvaa aaraamaropanasetubandhanaca"nkamanakara.naadiisu pu~n~nakammesu pasuto hutvaa viharanto sa"nghassa vihaara.m kaaretvaa tehi saddhi.m kaalena kaala.m vihaara.m gacchati. tesa.m bhariyaayopi upaasikaa hutvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m samaggaa maalaagandhavilepanaadihatthaa kaalena kaala.m vihaara.m gacchantiyo antaraamagge aaraamasabhaadiisu vissamitvaa gacchanti.

[03] athekadivasa.m ^a^V0.0132^ea^ katipayaa dhuttaa ekissaa sabhaaya sannisinnaa taasu tattha vissamitvaa gataasu taasa.m ruupasampatti.m disvaa pa.tibaddhacittaa hutvaa taasa.m siilaacaaragu.nasampannata.m ~natvaa katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m ``ko etaasu ekissaapi siilabheda.m kaatu.m samattho''ti. tattha a~n~nataro ``aha.m samattho''ti aaha. te tena ``sahassena abbhuta.m karomaa''ti abbhuta.m aka.msu. so anekehi upaayehi vaayamamaano taasu sabha.m aagataasu sumu~ncita.m sattatanti.m madhurassara.m vii.na.m vaadento madhureneva sarena kaamapa.tisa.myuttagiitaani gaayanto giitasaddena taasu a~n~natara.m itthi.m siilabheda.m paapento aticaarini.m katvaa te dhutte sahassa.m paraajesi. te sahassaparaajitaa tassaa saamikassa aarocesu.m. saamiko ta.m pucchi -- ``ki.m tva.m evaruupaa, yathaa te ^a^M0.0141^ea^ purisaa avocu''nti. saa ``naaha.m iidisa.m jaanaamii''ti pa.tikkhipitvaa tasmi.m asaddahante samiipe .thita.m sunakha.m dassetvaa sapatha.m akaasi ``sace mayaa taadisa.m paapakamma.m kata.m, aya.m chinnaka.n.no kaa.lasunakho tattha tattha bhave jaata.m ma.m ^a^P0.0152^ea^ khaadatuu''ti. itaraapi pa~ncasataa itthiyo ta.m itthi.m aticaarini.m jaanantii ki.m aya.m tathaaruupa.m paapa.m akaasi, udaahu naakaasii''ti coditaa ``na maya.m evaruupa.m jaanaamaa''ti musaa vatvaa ``sace maya.m jaanaama, bhave bhave etissaayeva daasiyo bhaveyyaamaa''ti sapatha.m aka.msu.

[03] atha saa aticaarinii itthii teneva vippa.tisaarena .dayhamaanahadayaa sussitvaa na cireneva kaala.m katvaa himavati pabbataraaje sattanna.m mahaasaraana.m a~n~natarassa ka.n.namu.n.dadahassa tiire vimaanapetii hutvaa nibbatti. vimaanasaamantaa cassaa kammavipaakaanubhavanayoggaa ekaa pokkhara.nii nibbatti. sesaa ca pa~ncasataa itthiyo kaala.m katvaa sapathakammavasena tassaayeva daasiyo hutvaa nibbatti.msu. saa tattha pubbe katassa pu~n~nakammassa phalena divasabhaaga.m dibbasampatti.m anubhavitvaa a.d.dharatte paapakammabalasa~ncoditaa sayanato u.t.thahitvaa pokkhara.nitiira.m gacchati. tattha gata.m gajapotakappamaa.no eko kaa.lasunakho bheravaruupo chinnaka.n.no tikhi.naayatakathinadaa.tho suvipphulitakhadira"ngaarapu~njasadisanayano nirantarappavattavijjulataasa"nghaatasadisajivho kathinatikhi.nanakho kharaayatadubba.n.nalomo tato aagantvaa ta.m bhuumiya.m nipaatetvaa atisayajighacchaabhibhuuto viya pasayha khaadanto a.t.thisa"nkhalikamatta.m katvaa dantehi gahetvaa pokkhara.niya.m khipitvaa antaradhaayati. saa ca tattha pakkhittasamanantarameva pakatiruupadhaarinii hutvaa vimaana.m abhiruyha sayane nipajjati. itaraa pana tassaa daasabyameva dukkha.m anubhavanti. eva.m taasa.m tattha vasantiina.m pa~n~naasaadhikaani pa~nca vassasataani viitivattaani.

[01] atha ^a^V0.0133^ea^ taasa.m purisehi vinaa dibbasampatti.m anubhavantiina.m ukka.n.thaa ahesu.m. tattha ca ka.n.namu.n.dadahato niggataa pabbatavivarena aagantvaa ga"nga.m nadi.m anupavi.t.thaa ekaa nadii atthi. taasa~nca vasana.t.thaanasamiipe ^a^P0.0153^ea^ eko dibbaphalehi ambarukkhehi panasalabujaadiihi ca upasobhito aaraamasadiso ara~n~nappadeso atthi. taa eva.m samacintesu.m -- ``handa, maya.m imaani ambaphalaani imissaa nadiyaa pakkhipissaama, appeva naama ima.m phala.m disvaa phalalobhena ^a^M0.0142^ea^ kocideva puriso idhaagaccheyya, tena saddhi.m ramissaamaati. taa tathaa aka.msu. taahi pana pakkhittaani ambaphalaani kaanici taapasaa ga.nhi.msu, kaanici vanacarakaa, kaanici kaakaa vilujji.msu, kaanici tiire laggi.msu. eka.m pana ga"ngaaya sota.m patvaa anukkamena baaraa.nasi.m sampaapu.ni.

[03] tena ca samayena baaraa.nasiraajaa lohajaalaparikkhitte ga"ngaajale nhaayati. atha ta.m phala.m nadisotena vuyhamaana.m anukkamena aagantvaa lohajaale laggi. ta.m va.n.nagandharasasampanna.m mahanta.m dibba.m ambaphala.m disvaa raajapurisaa ra~n~no upanesu.m. raajaa tassa ekadesa.m gahetvaa viima.msanatthaaya ekassa bandhanaagaare .thapitassa vajjhacorassa khaaditu.m adaasi. so ta.m khaaditvaa ``deva, mayaa evaruupa.m na khaaditapubba.m, dibbamida.m ma~n~ne ambaphala''nti aaha. raajaa punapi tassa eka.m kha.n.da.m adaasi. so ta.m khaaditvaa vigatavalitapalito ativiya manohararuupo yobbane .thito viya ahosi. ta.m disvaa raajaa acchariyabbhutajaato ta.m ambaphala.m paribhu~njitvaa sariire visesa.m labhitvaa manusse pucchi -- ``kattha evaruupaani dibbaambaphalaani sa.mvijjantii''ti? manussaa evamaaha.msu -- ``himavante kira, deva, pabbataraaje''ti. ``sakkaa pana taani aanetu''nti? ``vanacarakaa, deva, jaanantii''ti.

[03] raajaa vanacarake pakkosaapetvaa tesa.m tamattha.m aacikkhitvaa tehi sammantetvaa dinnassa ekassa vanacarakassa sahassa.m datvaa ta.m vissajjesi -- ``gaccha ^a^P0.0154^ea^, siigha.m ta.m me ambaphala.m aanehii''ti. so ta.m kahaapa.nasahassa.m puttadaarassa datvaa paatheyya.m gahetvaa pa.tiga"nga.m ka.n.namu.n.dadahaabhimukho gantvaa manussapatha.m atikkamitvaa ka.n.namu.n.dadahato ora.m sa.t.thiyojanappamaa.ne padese eka.m taapasa.m disvaa tena aacikkhitamaggena gacchanto puna ti.msayojanappamaa.ne padese eka.m taapasa.m disvaa, tena aacikkhitamaggena gacchanto puna pannarasayojanappamaa.ne .thaane a~n~na.m taapasa.m disvaa, tassa attano aagamanakaara.na.m kathesi. taapaso ta.m anusaasi -- ``ito pa.t.thaaya ima.m mahaaga"nga.m pahaaya ima.m khuddakanadi.m nissaaya pa.tisota.m gacchanto yadaa pabbatavivara.m passasi, tadaa rattiya.m ukka.m gahetvaa paviseyyaasi. aya~nca ^a^V0.0134^ea^ nadii rattiya.m nappavattati, tena ^a^M0.0143^ea^ te gamanayoggaa hoti, katipayayojanaatikkamena te ambe passissasii''ti. so tathaa katvaa udayante suuriye vividharatanara.msijaalapajjotitabhuumibhaaga.m phalabhaaraavanatasaakhaavitaanataruga.nopasobhita.m naanaavidhaviha"ngaga.nuupakuujita.m ativiya manohara.m ambavana.m sampaapu.ni.

[03] atha na.m taa amanussitthiyo duuratova aagacchanta.m disvaa ``esa mama pariggaho, esa mama pariggaho''ti upadhaavi.msu. so pana taahi saddhi.m tattha dibbasampatti.m anubhavitu.m yoggassa pu~n~nakammassa akatattaa taa disvaava bhiito viravanto palaayitvaa anukkamena baaraa.nasi.m patvaa ta.m pavatti.m ra~n~no aarocesi. raajaa ta.m sutvaa taa itthiyo da.t.thu.m ambaphalaani ca paribhu~njitu.m sa~njaataabhilaaso rajjabhaara.m amaccesu aaropetvaa migavaapadesena sannaddhadhanukalaapo khagga.m bandhitvaa katipayamanussaparivaaro teneva vanacarakena dassitamaggena gantvaa katipayayojanantare .thaane manussepi .thapetvaa vanacarakameva gahetvaa anukkamena gantvaa tampi tato nivattaapetvaa udayante ^a^P0.0155^ea^ divaakare ambavana.m paavisi. atha na.m taa itthiyo abhinavauppannamiva devaputta.m disvaa paccuggantvaa ``raajaa''ti ~natvaa sa~njaatasinehabahumaanaa sakkacca.m nhaapetvaa dibbehi vatthaala"nkaaramaalaagandhavilepanehi suma.n.ditapasaadhita.m katvaa vimaana.m aaropetvaa naanaggarasa.m dibbabhojana.m bhojetvaa tassa icchaanuruupa.m payirupaasi.msu.

[03] atha diya.d.dhavassasate atikkante raajaa a.d.dharattisamaye u.t.thahitvaa nisinno ta.m aticaarini.m peti.m pokkhara.nitiira.m gacchanti.m disvaa ``ki.m nu kho esaa imaaya velaaya gacchatii''ti viima.msitukaamo anubandhi. atha na.m tattha gata.m sunakhena khajjamaana.m disvaa ``ki.m nu kho ida''nti ajaananto tayo ca divase viima.msitvaa ``eso etissaa paccaamitto bhavissatii''ti nisitena usunaa vijjhitvaa jiivitaa voropetvaa ta~nca itthi.m pothetvaa pokkhara.ni.m otaaretvaa pa.tiladdhapurimaruupa.m disvaa --
[22] tassaa tiire tuva.m .thaasi, harite saddale subhe..
[27] yadaa ca khaayitaa aasi, a.t.thisa"nkhalikaa kataa.
[22] ogaahasi pokkhara.ni.m, hoti kaayo yathaa pure..
[21] ``ki.m ^a^M0.0145^ea^ ^a^V0.0136^ea^ nu kaayena vaacaaya, manasaa dukka.ta.m kata.m.
[25] dvaadasahi gaathaahi ta.m tassa pavatti.m pa.tipucchi.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^so.n.nasopaanaphalakaa^eb^ti suva.n.namayasopaanaphalakaa. ^b^so.n.navaalukasanthataa^eb^ti samantato suva.n.namayaahi vaalukaahi santhataa. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti pokkhara.niya.m. ^b^sogandhiyaa^eb^ti sogandhikaa. ^b^vagguu^eb^ti sundaraa ruciraa. ^b^sucigandhaa^eb^ti manu~n~nagandhaa.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ ^b^naanaagandhasameritaa^eb^ti naanaavidhasurabhigandhavasena gandhavaayunaa samantato eritaa. ^b^naanaapadumasa~nchannaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0157^ea^ naanaavidharattapadumasa~nchaaditasalilatalaa. ^b^pu.n.dariikasamotataa^eb^ti setapadumehi ca samoki.n.naa.
[03] 350^b^.^eb^ ^b^surabhi.m sampavaayantii^eb^ti sammadeva sugandha.m vaayati pokkhara.niiti adhippaayo. ^b^ha.msako~ncaabhirudaa^eb^ti ha.msehi ca ko~ncehi ca abhinaaditaa.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ^b^naanaadijaga.naaki.n.naa^eb^ti naanaadijaga.naaki.n.naa. ^b^naanaasaraga.naayutaa^eb^ti naanaavidhaviha"ngamaabhirudasamuuhayuttaa. ^b^naanaaphaladharaa^eb^ti naanaavidhaphaladhaarino sabbakaala.m vividhaphalabhaaranamitasaakhattaa. ^b^naanaapupphadharaa vanaa^eb^ti naanaavidhasurabhikusumadaayikaani vanaaniiti attho. li"ngavipallaasena hi ``vanaa''ti vutta.m.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ^b^na manussesu iidisa.m nagara^eb^nti yaadisa.m tava ida.m nagara.m, iidisa.m manussesu natthi, manussaloke na upalabbhatiiti attho. ^b^ruupiyamayaa^eb^ti rajatamayaa. ^b^daddallamaanaa^eb^ti ativiya virocamaanaa. ^b^aabhentii^eb^ti sobhayanti. ^b^samantaa caturo disaa^eb^ti samantato catassopi disaayo.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaa temaa^eb^ti yaa te imaa. ^b^paricaarikaa^eb^ti veyyaavaccakaariniyo. ^b^taa^eb^ti taa paricaarikaayo. ^b^kambukaayuuradharaa^eb^ti sa"nkhavalayakaayuuravibhuusitaa. ^b^ka~ncanaave.labhuusitaa^eb^ti suva.n.nava.ta.msakasamala"nkatakesahatthaa.
